GOOGL_2024Q2_394.summary: The analyst is inquiring about the company's capital expenditures related to AI.

GOOGL_2024Q2_393.speaker: Sundar Pichai
GOOGL_2024Q2_393.original_quote: Look, on the Cloud and AI stuff, obviously, it is something which I think will end up being a big driver over time.
GOOGL_2024Q2_393.summary: The company believes that Cloud and AI will become significant drivers of growth over time.

GOOGL_2024Q2_397.speaker: Justin Post
GOOGL_2024Q2_397.original_quote: Would you characterize that as new AI demand helping drive that year-to-date?
GOOGL_2024Q2_397.summary: The analyst is inquiring whether new AI demand is contributing to the company's performance year-to-date.

GOOGL_2024Q2_395.speaker: Stephen Ju
GOOGL_2024Q2_395.original_quote: Sundar, to rephrase the AI question, it seems that when we speak with model builders, the initial applications focus more on cost savings and efficiency.
GOOGL_2024Q2_395.summary: The quote indicates that initial applications of AI by model builders are primarily aimed at achieving cost savings and improving efficiency.

GOOGL_2024Q3_399.speaker: Sundar Pichai
GOOGL_2024Q3_399.original_quote: In 18 months, we reduced cost by more than 90% for these queries through hardware, engineering, and technical breakthroughs while doubling the size of our custom Gemini model.
GOOGL_2024Q3_399.summary: The company has reduced costs by over 90% for specific queries through advancements in hardware, engineering, and technical breakthroughs, while also doubling the size of their custom Gemini model.

GOOGL_2024Q2_396.speaker: Philipp Schindler
GOOGL_2024Q2_396.original_quote: Yes, on the second one, look on the direct response side, as you know, it is about driving and converting commercial intent and customers are obviously benefiting from including video in their AI-powered campaigns, it could be PMax, it could be DemandGen, and obviously using our automated tools to e
GOOGL_2024Q2_396.summary: The company is enabling customers to benefit from including video in their AI-powered campaigns, such as Performance Max and Demand Generation, while utilizing their automated tools.

GOOGL_2024Q2_398.speaker: Ruth Porat
GOOGL_2024Q2_398.original_quote: The Cloud team is engaging widely with customers globally through AI-related solutions, AI infrastructure solutions, and generative AI solutions.
GOOGL_2024Q2_398.summary: The Cloud team is actively engaging with customers worldwide by offering AI-related solutions, AI infrastructure solutions, and generative AI solutions.

GOOGL_2024Q3_404.speaker: Sundar Pichai
GOOGL_2024Q3_404.original_quote: I think one of the—we are well-positioned because in our AI infrastructure, we have a comprehensive solution set, right?
GOOGL_2024Q3_404.summary: The company is well-positioned due to its comprehensive AI infrastructure solution set.

GOOGL_2024Q3_400.speaker: Philipp Schindler
GOOGL_2024Q3_400.original_quote: I'll start with performance for the quarter and then describe the progress we're seeing across ads, YouTube, and partnerships, highlighting the impact AI is already having on our business.
GOOGL_2024Q3_400.summary: The company is highlighting the impact AI is already having on their business across ads, YouTube, and partnerships.

GOOGL_2024Q3_401.speaker: Anat Ashkenazi
GOOGL_2024Q3_401.original_quote: Sales and marketing expenses increased 5%, primarily reflecting investment in advertising and promotional efforts related to the Made by Google launches, as well as for AI and Gemini.
GOOGL_2024Q3_401.summary: The company is investing in advertising and promotional efforts related to AI and Gemini as part of its sales and marketing expenses.

GOOGL_2024Q3_402.speaker: Brian Nowak
GOOGL_2024Q3_402.original_quote: The first one, over the course of the last year plus, you've sort of showcased a lot of different types of new GenAI enabled search products to reimagine the search experience.
GOOGL_2024Q3_402.summary: The company is showcasing various new GenAI-enabled search products to transform the search experience.

GOOGL_2024Q3_405.speaker: Anat Ashkenazi
GOOGL_2024Q3_405.original_quote: So let me provide a little more color on our capital investments and certainly an important area in this time of investments in AI.
GOOGL_2024Q3_405.summary: The company is focusing on capital investments, particularly emphasizing the importance of investments in AI.

GOOGL_2024Q3_403.speaker: Sundar Pichai
GOOGL_2024Q3_403.original_quote: I think we are with very—while we've rolled out AI Overviews to over 1 billion users, there is a lot more innovation there we are actively working on.
GOOGL_2024Q3_403.summary: The company has rolled out AI Overviews to over 1 billion users and is actively working on further innovations in this area.

GOOGL_2024Q3_407.speaker: Sundar Pichai
GOOGL_2024Q3_407.original_quote: Our API volume, I commented on the Gemini APIs having gone up 14x in the past 6 months.
GOOGL_2024Q3_407.summary: Google's API volume for the Gemini APIs has increased 14 times over the past six months.

GOOGL_2024Q3_408.speaker: Justin Post
GOOGL_2024Q3_408.original_quote: I wanted to ask a little bit more about AI Overviews, maybe two parts.
GOOGL_2024Q3_408.summary: The analyst is requesting additional information about AI Overviews.

GOOGL_2024Q3_410.speaker: Michael Nathanson
GOOGL_2024Q3_410.original_quote: Sundar, there was this perception and even false that Alphabet was not as innovative on AI as they should.
GOOGL_2024Q3_410.summary: The quote addresses a perception that Alphabet is not as innovative in AI as expected, indicating a need to counter this belief.

GOOGL_2024Q3_409.speaker: Philipp Schindler
GOOGL_2024Q3_409.original_quote: As you know, we recently launched ads within AI Overviews on mobile in the U.S.
GOOGL_2024Q3_409.summary: The company recently launched advertisements within AI Overviews on mobile in the U.S.

GOOGL_2024Q3_406.speaker: Ross Sandler
GOOGL_2024Q3_406.original_quote: So first, Sundar, given the high stakes around native AI product usage, are there any milestones you can share around where Gemini usage is compared to the 250 million weekly active users that ChatGPT is seeing right now?
GOOGL_2024Q3_406.summary: The quote inquires about milestones related to Gemini's usage in comparison to ChatGPT's 250 million weekly active users, highlighting the importance of native AI product usage.

GOOG_2023Q1_415.speaker: Sundar Pichai
GOOG_2023Q1_415.original_quote: We introduced important product updates anchored in deep computer science and AI.
GOOG_2023Q1_415.summary: The company introduced important product updates that are based on deep computer science and AI.

GOOGL_2024Q3_412.speaker: Anat Ashkenazi
GOOGL_2024Q3_412.original_quote: Simplifying the organization, as Sundar just mentioned, also means using AI within our processes and how we complete work to find some efficiencies or opportunities for efficiencies.
GOOGL_2024Q3_412.summary: The company is using AI within its processes to find efficiencies and opportunities for improvement in how work is completed.

GOOGL_2024Q3_414.speaker: Philipp Schindler
GOOGL_2024Q3_414.original_quote: With the introduction of Gemini, we added many new features to PMax to deliver more powerful performance, helping advertisers scale and build high-quality creative assets and so on.
GOOGL_2024Q3_414.summary: The company is introducing Gemini, which adds new features to PMax to enhance performance for advertisers, enabling them to scale and create high-quality creative assets.

GOOGL_2024Q2_392.speaker: Eric Sheridan
GOOGL_2024Q2_392.original_quote: Sundar, maybe first for you, in terms of Cloud and bringing AI to the enterprise, I wanted to know if you go a little bit deeper in terms of how you are seeing AI actually get adopted and implemented, what it potentially could mean for the strategic positioning of the cloud business and the potentia
GOOGL_2024Q2_392.summary: The quote asks Sundar about the adoption and implementation of AI in the enterprise and its implications for the strategic positioning of the cloud business.

GOOGL_2024Q3_413.speaker: Stephen Ju
GOOGL_2024Q3_413.original_quote: I think in two separate blog posts from Google Cloud, talking about the real-life use cases for GenAI, I think you highlighted what was a pretty material increase in the number of companies that are starting to turn their, I guess, ideas into products.
GOOGL_2024Q3_413.summary: Google Cloud is highlighting a significant increase in the number of companies that are transforming their ideas into products using Generative AI, as discussed in two separate blog posts.

GOOGL_2024Q3_411.speaker: Sundar Pichai
GOOGL_2024Q3_411.original_quote: All seven products, which have 2 billion users, have done their first versions of incorporating Gemini, and there is an aggressive road map ahead for 2025.
GOOGL_2024Q3_411.summary: Google has incorporated Gemini into all seven of its products, which collectively serve 2 billion users, and has an aggressive roadmap planned for 2025.

GOOG_2023Q1_416.speaker: Philipp Schindler
GOOG_2023Q1_416.original_quote: PMax drove a 46% increase in revenue and a 31% jump in ROAS, leading to Caraway's best business day in history and a robust reinvestment in its AI-first strategy for Q1.
GOOG_2023Q1_416.summary: Caraway experienced a 46% increase in revenue and a 31% jump in ROAS due to PMax, which supports its AI-first strategy for Q1.

GOOG_2023Q1_417.speaker: Ruth Porat
GOOG_2023Q1_417.original_quote: I will now walk you through an update on our efforts to reengineer our cost base, slowing the pace of operating expense growth while creating capacity for key investment areas, particularly in support of AI across the company.
GOOG_2023Q1_417.summary: The company is creating capacity for key investment areas, specifically in support of AI across the organization, while reengineering its cost base and slowing operating expense growth.

GOOG_2023Q1_418.speaker: Brian Nowak
GOOG_2023Q1_418.original_quote: Sundar, I guess as you think over the course of the next 12 months, I know you have a lot of new AI tools to show us, what new behavior changes or capabilities are you most excited about for users, developers, and advertisers as these tools come out?
GOOG_2023Q1_418.summary: The quote inquires about the new AI tools that Sundar Pichai is excited to showcase over the next 12 months, focusing on the behavior changes and capabilities for users, developers, and advertisers.

GOOG_2023Q1_427.speaker: Ruth Porat
GOOG_2023Q1_427.original_quote: Importantly, we intend to continue investing to foster long-term growth, especially given the opportunities we see in delivering AI capabilities to our customers.
GOOG_2023Q1_427.summary: The company intends to continue investing in delivering AI capabilities to its customers to foster long-term growth.

GOOG_2023Q1_428.speaker: Colin Sebastian
GOOG_2023Q1_428.original_quote: I guess, first, Sundar, the consolidation of the AI teams, I think you talked about that helping to accelerate innovation.
GOOG_2023Q1_428.summary: The company is consolidating its AI teams to help accelerate innovation.

GOOG_2023Q1_421.speaker: Douglas Anmuth
GOOG_2023Q1_421.original_quote: Sundar, just as you think about integrating Bard into your Search products over time, can you just talk more about what percentage of Search queries you think would utilize large language model-type responses?
GOOG_2023Q1_421.summary: The quote asks Sundar about the integration of Bard into Search products and the expected percentage of Search queries that would use large language model-type responses.

GOOG_2023Q1_423.speaker: Ruth Porat
GOOG_2023Q1_423.original_quote: As we discussed last quarter, AI is a key component.
GOOG_2023Q1_423.summary: The company states that AI is a key component of their strategy, as previously discussed in the last quarter.

GOOG_2023Q1_422.speaker: Sundar Pichai
GOOG_2023Q1_422.original_quote: But we'll be bringing LLM experiences more natively into Search as well.
GOOG_2023Q1_422.summary: The company is bringing large language model (LLM) experiences more natively into its Search product.

GOOG_2023Q1_425.speaker: Ruth Porat
GOOG_2023Q1_425.original_quote: In particular, what we're excited about are long-term opportunities with AI, and we want to make sure we have the capacity to continue to invest there in the other areas where we see long-term growth in Search and Ads, Cloud, YouTube, hardware.
GOOG_2023Q1_425.summary: The company is excited about long-term opportunities with AI and intends to continue investing in AI alongside other growth areas such as Search, Ads, Cloud, YouTube, and hardware.

GOOG_2023Q1_424.speaker: Eric Sheridan
GOOG_2023Q1_424.original_quote: Can you give us a little bit more of your perspective on where we are in terms of the optimization theme broadly in cloud computing as a headwind to either revenue growth or backlog growth compared to the tailwinds of broader long-term consumption growth and, possibly, the contribution of AI initiat
GOOG_2023Q1_424.summary: The quote asks for insights on how the optimization theme in cloud computing is affecting revenue and backlog growth, particularly in relation to the long-term growth driven by AI initiatives.

GOOG_2023Q1_426.speaker: Ruth Porat
GOOG_2023Q1_426.original_quote: It goes to the various work streams that both Sundar and I referenced around using AI and automation to improve productivity, all that we're doing with suppliers and vendors to be as efficient as possible, and all that we're doing around optimizing how and where we work.
GOOG_2023Q1_426.summary: The company is using AI and automation to improve productivity and efficiency in its operations, including work with suppliers and vendors, as well as optimizing work processes.

GOOG_2023Q1_429.speaker: Sundar Pichai
GOOG_2023Q1_429.original_quote: Their collective accomplishments in AI over the last decade have really set the stage for this moment.
GOOG_2023Q1_429.summary: The company acknowledges that the collective accomplishments in AI over the last decade have prepared them for the current moment.

GOOG_2023Q2_432.speaker: Philipp Schindler
GOOG_2023Q2_432.original_quote: In fact, today, nearly 80% of advertisers already use at least one AI-powered Search Ads product.
GOOG_2023Q2_432.summary: The company states that nearly 80% of advertisers are currently using at least one AI-powered Search Ads product.

GOOG_2023Q1_430.speaker: Philipp Schindler
GOOG_2023Q1_430.original_quote: Our local and omnichannel solutions are helping bridge the gap here between online and offline by using AI to reach nearby shoppers, promote local inventory fulfillment options, optimize in-store visits and sales, for example.
GOOG_2023Q1_430.summary: Google is using AI to enhance local and omnichannel solutions by reaching nearby shoppers, promoting local inventory fulfillment options, and optimizing in-store visits and sales.

GOOG_2023Q2_431.speaker: Sundar Pichai
GOOG_2023Q2_431.original_quote: More than 70% of generative AI unicorns are Google Cloud customers, including Cohere, Jasper, Typeface, and many more.
GOOG_2023Q2_431.summary: Google Cloud has more than 70% of generative AI unicorns as customers, which includes companies like Cohere, Jasper, and Typeface.

GOOG_2023Q2_433.speaker: Ruth Porat
GOOG_2023Q2_433.original_quote: We are particularly excited about the customer interest in our AI-optimized infrastructure, our large language models, our AI platform services, and our new generative AI offerings such as Duet AI for Google Workspace, although we are still clearly in the early days.
GOOG_2023Q2_433.summary: The company is excited about customer interest in its AI-optimized infrastructure, large language models, AI platform services, and new generative AI offerings like Duet AI for Google Workspace, acknowledging that they are still in the early days of these developments.

GOOG_2023Q2_436.speaker: Eric Sheridan
GOOG_2023Q2_436.original_quote: Sundar, can you talk a little bit about elements of open source versus closed and things like custom silicon and how you're thinking about AI offerings broadly developing over the next couple of years and what you see as some of the key differentiation points that Google either through the cloud bus
GOOG_2023Q2_436.summary: The analyst is asking Sundar about Google's approach to AI offerings, particularly in relation to open source versus closed systems and custom silicon, as well as the differentiation points for Google in the cloud business over the next few years.

GOOG_2023Q2_438.speaker: Douglas Anmuth
GOOG_2023Q2_438.original_quote: For Sundar, curious, how do you think about timing for more broadly integrating generative AI into Search?
GOOG_2023Q2_438.summary: The quote asks Sundar about the timing for the broader integration of generative AI into Search.

GOOG_2023Q2_435.speaker: Sundar Pichai
GOOG_2023Q2_435.original_quote: This gives me a sense that as Gemini is being built from the ground up to be multimodal, I think that's an area that's going to excite users.
GOOG_2023Q2_435.summary: Google is building Gemini from the ground up to be multimodal, which is expected to excite users.

GOOG_2023Q2_445.speaker: Philipp Schindler
GOOG_2023Q2_445.original_quote: AI is a foundational component that really allows us to help users, advertisers, publishers, and partners at scale.
GOOG_2023Q2_445.summary: Google is using AI as a foundational component to assist users, advertisers, publishers, and partners on a large scale.

GOOG_2023Q2_447.speaker: Philipp Schindler
GOOG_2023Q2_447.original_quote: Look, as I said earlier, generative AI is supercharging new and existing ads products with really tons of potential ahead.
GOOG_2023Q2_447.summary: The company is enhancing both new and existing advertising products with generative AI, which has significant potential for future growth.

GOOG_2023Q3_449.speaker: Philipp Schindler
GOOG_2023Q3_449.original_quote: It combines video and image ads in one campaign with access to 3 billion users across YouTube and Google, along with the ability to optimize and measure across the funnel using Google AI.
GOOG_2023Q3_449.summary: The company is optimizing and measuring ad campaigns across video and image formats using Google AI, reaching 3 billion users on YouTube and Google.

GOOG_2023Q1_419.speaker: Sundar Pichai
GOOG_2023Q1_419.original_quote: In Search, we've been utilizing AI for some time, which has significantly contributed to the advancements in Search quality over the past few years through the use of large language models.
GOOG_2023Q1_419.summary: Google has been utilizing AI in Search for some time, which has significantly improved Search quality through the use of large language models.

GOOG_2023Q1_420.speaker: Ruth Porat
GOOG_2023Q1_420.original_quote: And then in terms of the second part of your question, AI has been so much a part of what we've been doing for quite some time that there are a number of different ways to answer it.
GOOG_2023Q1_420.summary: The company has been integrating AI into its operations for a significant period, indicating that AI is a fundamental aspect of its activities.

GOOG_2023Q3_451.speaker: Brian Nowak
GOOG_2023Q3_451.original_quote: There's somewhat of an investor debate about sort of the incremental return on capital to Search when it comes to AI.
GOOG_2023Q3_451.summary: The quote mentions an ongoing debate among investors regarding the incremental return on capital related to AI in Search.

GOOG_2023Q3_452.speaker: Ruth Porat
GOOG_2023Q3_452.original_quote: They continue to be our main focus, as they will help us manage expense growth while also supporting the exciting investment opportunities in front of us, particularly in AI.
GOOG_2023Q3_452.summary: The company is focusing on AI to manage expense growth and support investment opportunities.

GOOG_2023Q2_442.speaker: Sundar Pichai
GOOG_2023Q2_442.original_quote: It is an exciting moment overall in Cloud because there is definitely a lot of interest from customers on AI, and they definitely are engaging in many more conversations with us.
GOOG_2023Q2_442.summary: Google Cloud is experiencing increased customer interest in AI, leading to more engagement and conversations with clients.

GOOG_2023Q2_440.speaker: Ruth Porat
GOOG_2023Q2_440.original_quote: The primary driver of this, our investments in AI across the company, including investments that we've already talked about, proprietary TPUs, and all that we're doing with GPUs as well as data center capacity.
GOOG_2023Q2_440.summary: The company is investing in AI across various areas, including proprietary TPUs, GPUs, and data center capacity.

GOOG_2023Q2_439.speaker: Sundar Pichai
GOOG_2023Q2_439.original_quote: While it's exciting new technology, we've constantly been bringing in AI innovations into Search for the past few years, and this is the next step in that journey.
GOOG_2023Q2_439.summary: The company is continuously integrating AI innovations into its Search functionality, and this quote indicates that they are taking the next step in that ongoing process.

GOOG_2023Q2_441.speaker: Justin Post
GOOG_2023Q2_441.original_quote: And then any uptick are you seeing related to AI spending in the total revenues this quarter or in the second half?
GOOG_2023Q2_441.summary: The analyst is inquiring about any increase in revenues related to AI spending for the current quarter or the second half of the year.

GOOG_2023Q2_443.speaker: Sundar Pichai
GOOG_2023Q2_443.original_quote: We are definitely both, as Ruth mentioned, on AI investments, going to be committed to making sure we invest to realize the opportunity.
GOOG_2023Q2_443.summary: The company is committed to investing in AI to realize its opportunities.

GOOG_2023Q3_453.speaker: Sundar Pichai
GOOG_2023Q3_453.original_quote: And to your first part, obviously, we see AI as a foundational platform shift and are excited about the opportunities across our business.
GOOG_2023Q3_453.summary: The company sees AI as a foundational platform shift and is excited about the opportunities it presents across its business.

GOOG_2023Q3_448.speaker: Sundar Pichai
GOOG_2023Q3_448.original_quote: From Q2 to Q3, the number of active Generative AI projects on Vertex AI grew by 7x, including Highmark Health, which is creating more personalized member materials.
GOOG_2023Q3_448.summary: The number of active Generative AI projects on Vertex AI increased by 7x from Q2 to Q3, with Highmark Health working on more personalized member materials.

GOOG_2023Q3_454.speaker: Doug Anmuth
GOOG_2023Q3_454.original_quote: Just, Sundar, you talked a lot about AI.
GOOG_2023Q3_454.summary: The quote indicates that Sundar discussed AI extensively during the call.

GOOG_2023Q2_434.speaker: Brian Nowak
GOOG_2023Q2_434.original_quote: And what new behaviors or consumer utility are you most excited about as you think about what Gemini could provide for people over the course of the next year or so?
GOOG_2023Q2_434.summary: The quote expresses curiosity about the new behaviors or consumer utility that Gemini, presumably an AI initiative, could offer to people in the upcoming year.

GOOG_2023Q3_456.speaker: Eric Sheridan
GOOG_2023Q3_456.original_quote: And I wanted to know if we could get your updated thoughts on how AI might impact the broader advertising industry and how you're aligning Alphabet in Google's goals with AI and where it might take the advertising industry in the years ahead?
GOOG_2023Q3_456.summary: The quote asks for updated thoughts on how AI might impact the advertising industry and how Alphabet is aligning its goals with AI in this context.

GOOG_2023Q3_458.speaker: Lloyd Walmsley
GOOG_2023Q3_458.original_quote: And then the second one, also sort of Generative AI related.
GOOG_2023Q3_458.summary: The quote mentions a topic related to Generative AI, indicating a connection to that area.

GOOG_2023Q3_459.speaker: Sundar Pichai
GOOG_2023Q3_459.original_quote: We have successfully navigated transitions before, like moving from desktop to mobile, and now from mobile to an AI-driven experience.
GOOG_2023Q3_459.summary: The company is transitioning from a mobile experience to an AI-driven experience.

GOOG_2023Q3_457.speaker: Philipp Schindler
GOOG_2023Q3_457.original_quote: Many advertisers recognize their value, and nearly 80% already utilize at least one AI-powered search advertising product.
GOOG_2023Q3_457.summary: The company reports that nearly 80% of advertisers are utilizing at least one AI-powered search advertising product, indicating strong adoption of their AI offerings in advertising.

GOOG_2023Q3_455.speaker: Sundar Pichai
GOOG_2023Q3_455.original_quote: On Gemini, obviously, it's an effort from our combined Google DeepMind team.
GOOG_2023Q3_455.summary: Google is working on Gemini as a collaborative effort from the Google DeepMind team.

GOOG_2023Q3_461.speaker: Sundar Pichai
GOOG_2023Q3_461.original_quote: And similarly, with AI, there'll be many ways people get information, but it also offers us an opportunity in Search and in Assistant to take it to the next level and answer use cases, which we couldn't have done before and expand the diverse set of needs where we are sourced.
GOOG_2023Q3_461.summary: Google is using AI to enhance Search and Assistant, aiming to address use cases that were previously unattainable and to broaden the range of needs they can fulfill.

GOOG_2023Q3_462.speaker: Philipp Schindler
GOOG_2023Q3_462.original_quote: As we mentioned in April, the initial results from our interspace ads testing indicated that a blend of privacy-preserving signals and AI optimization yields positive outcomes for businesses preparing for a future without cookies.
GOOG_2023Q3_462.summary: The company is testing interspace ads that combine privacy-preserving signals with AI optimization, which has shown positive results for businesses in a cookie-less future.

GOOG_2023Q2_444.speaker: Kenneth Gawrelski
GOOG_2023Q2_444.original_quote: And how long until we possibly get to the point of more automated AI-generated creative in production?
GOOG_2023Q2_444.summary: The quote raises a question about the timeline for achieving more automated AI-generated creative in production.

GOOG_2023Q4_465.speaker: Ruth Porat
GOOG_2023Q4_465.original_quote: We're very pleased with the momentum of GCP with an increasing contribution from AI.
GOOG_2023Q4_465.summary: Google Cloud Platform (GCP) is experiencing positive momentum with a growing contribution from AI.

GOOG_2023Q4_463.speaker: Sundar Pichai
GOOG_2023Q4_463.original_quote: One, our investments in AI, including how it's helping Search; two, subscriptions, which reached $15 billion in annual revenue, up 5x since 2019.
GOOG_2023Q4_463.summary: The company is investing in AI to enhance its Search capabilities. Additionally, it reports that subscriptions have reached $15 billion in annual revenue, increasing fivefold since 2019.

GOOG_2023Q4_464.speaker: Philipp Schindler
GOOG_2023Q4_464.original_quote: Over the past few calls, I have emphasized our commitment to using Google AI to enhance profitability for our customers and assist them in achieving their goals in a cost-conscious environment.
GOOG_2023Q4_464.summary: Google is committed to using Google AI to enhance profitability for its customers and help them achieve their goals in a cost-conscious environment.

GOOG_2023Q4_468.speaker: Ruth Porat
GOOG_2023Q4_468.original_quote: We have several other initiatives in progress, including improving efficiency in our technical infrastructure, streamlining operations through AI, collaborating with our suppliers and vendors, and optimizing our real estate portfolio.
GOOG_2023Q4_468.summary: The company is streamlining operations through AI and improving efficiency in its technical infrastructure.

GOOG_2023Q4_467.speaker: Philipp Schindler
GOOG_2023Q4_467.original_quote: AI has been fundamental to our advertising products for a long time, and recent advancements are helping us provide greater value to advertisers in various areas such as bidding, targeting, and creative, as well as enhancing the experiences of both advertisers and publishers.
GOOG_2023Q4_467.summary: Google has integrated AI into its advertising products for a long time, and recent advancements are improving bidding, targeting, and creative aspects, while also enhancing experiences for advertisers and publishers.

GOOG_2023Q2_437.speaker: Sundar Pichai
GOOG_2023Q2_437.original_quote: I would broadly say the investments for AI, when you look at the type of deep computer science work, the talent we have worked hard to bring to the company, and from the ground up, the infrastructure we have built, from the earliest days Google has been a company, we've thought about the switches in
GOOG_2023Q2_437.summary: Google has made significant investments in AI, focusing on deep computer science work and building infrastructure from the ground up. The company has also worked hard to attract top talent in the AI field.

GOOG_2023Q4_475.speaker: Mark Mahaney
GOOG_2023Q4_475.original_quote: One question on YouTube AI and one on cloud.
GOOG_2023Q4_475.summary: The quote mentions inquiries regarding YouTube's AI and the cloud services offered by the company.

GOOG_2023Q4_476.speaker: Sundar Pichai
GOOG_2023Q4_476.original_quote: And as you saw that greater than 70% of GenAI unicorns are using Google Cloud.
GOOG_2023Q4_476.summary: Google Cloud is being utilized by over 70% of GenAI unicorns.

GOOG_2023Q4_477.speaker: Philipp Schindler
GOOG_2023Q4_477.original_quote: AI plays a crucial role in this development.
GOOG_2023Q4_477.summary: The company states that AI plays a crucial role in their development efforts.

GOOG_2024Q1_478.speaker: Sundar Pichai
GOOG_2024Q1_478.original_quote: We have developed new AI models and algorithms that are more than 100x more efficient than they were 18 months ago.
GOOG_2024Q1_478.summary: The company has developed new AI models and algorithms that are over 100 times more efficient than those created 18 months ago.

GOOG_2024Q1_479.speaker: Philipp Schindler
GOOG_2024Q1_479.original_quote: First, it bears repeating that AI innovation across our Ads ecosystem is core to every aspect of our product portfolio, from targeting, bidding, creative, measurement, and across campaign types.
GOOG_2024Q1_479.summary: Google is integrating AI innovation into every aspect of its Ads ecosystem, including targeting, bidding, creative, measurement, and various campaign types.

GOOG_2023Q4_469.speaker: Sundar Pichai
GOOG_2023Q4_469.original_quote: We will also leverage generative AI, especially with our advanced models in Bard, allowing us to function more as an agent in the future, potentially going beyond just providing answers to better assist users.
GOOG_2023Q4_469.summary: The company will leverage generative AI through its advanced models in Bard, aiming to function more as an agent in the future to assist users beyond just providing answers.

GOOG_2023Q4_470.speaker: Philipp Schindler
GOOG_2023Q4_470.original_quote: And so the feedback we're always getting is they need easy solutions that could drive value quickly, and several of the AI-powered solutions that you're mentioning are actually making the workflow and the whole on-ramp and the bidded targeting creative and so on, you mentioned that is so much easier
GOOG_2023Q4_470.summary: The company is providing AI-powered solutions that simplify workflows and enhance bidded targeting, making it easier for users to drive value quickly.

GOOG_2024Q1_480.speaker: Ruth Porat
GOOG_2024Q1_480.original_quote: Turning to the Google Cloud segment, revenues were $9.6 billion for the quarter, up 28%, reflecting significant growth in GCP with an increasing contribution from AI and strong Google Workspace growth, primarily driven by increases in average revenue per seat.
GOOG_2024Q1_480.summary: Google Cloud segment revenues reached $9.6 billion for the quarter, with significant growth attributed to AI contributions and strong Google Workspace performance driven by higher average revenue per seat.

GOOG_2024Q1_481.speaker: Sundar Pichai
GOOG_2024Q1_481.original_quote: Overall, I think with generative AI in Search, with our AI overviews, I think we will expand the type of queries we can serve our users.
GOOG_2024Q1_481.summary: The company is expanding the types of queries it can serve users by integrating generative AI into its Search and providing AI overviews.

GOOG_2023Q4_471.speaker: Justin Post
GOOG_2023Q4_471.original_quote: Just on Search growth, I think there are some concerns on the use of competitive AI tools as an alternative to Search.
GOOG_2023Q4_471.summary: The quote expresses concerns regarding the use of competitive AI tools as alternatives to Google's Search, indicating potential challenges to Search growth.

GOOG_2024Q1_483.speaker: Douglas Anmuth
GOOG_2024Q1_483.original_quote: Sundar, you talked about bringing more generative AI features into the main Search page.
GOOG_2024Q1_483.summary: The company is bringing more generative AI features into the main Search page.

GOOG_2024Q1_482.speaker: Ruth Porat
GOOG_2024Q1_482.original_quote: And then the other work streams we've talked to you about in the past, like all of the work around technical infrastructure, which Sundar alluded to; streamlining operations within the company through the use of AI; what we're doing with procurement with our suppliers and vendors, which he also refe
GOOG_2024Q1_482.summary: The company is streamlining operations internally through the use of AI, including efforts related to procurement with suppliers and vendors.

GOOG_2023Q4_473.speaker: Ruth Porat
GOOG_2023Q4_473.original_quote: It really reflects our outlook for everything Sundar, Philipp, and I have been talking about, the extraordinary applications of AI within Google DeepMind, Google Services, Google Cloud—it's across the board for users, for advertisers, developers, cloud enterprise customers, governments.
GOOG_2023Q4_473.summary: The company is reflecting on the extraordinary applications of AI across Google DeepMind, Google Services, and Google Cloud, impacting users, advertisers, developers, cloud enterprise customers, and governments.

GOOG_2023Q4_466.speaker: Brian Nowak
GOOG_2023Q4_466.original_quote: Philipp, the first one is about a lot of the new generative AI advertising tools.
GOOG_2023Q4_466.summary: The company is introducing new generative AI advertising tools.

GOOG_2024Q1_486.speaker: Sundar Pichai
GOOG_2024Q1_486.original_quote: Obviously, I think the AI transition, I think it's a once-in-a-generation opportunity.
GOOG_2024Q1_486.summary: The company views the AI transition as a once-in-a-generation opportunity.

GOOG_2023Q3_450.speaker: Ruth Porat
GOOG_2023Q3_450.original_quote: Finally, our reported CapEx in Q3 was $8 billion, driven overwhelmingly by investment in our technical infrastructure with the largest component for servers, followed by data centers, reflecting a meaningful increase in our investments in AI compute.
GOOG_2023Q3_450.summary: The company reported $8 billion in capital expenditures for Q3, primarily driven by investments in technical infrastructure, with a significant portion allocated to AI compute.

GOOG_2024Q1_488.speaker: Ruth Porat
GOOG_2024Q1_488.original_quote: It starts with all that we're doing in support of the Gemini foundational model but then also, clearly, the work across Cloud, on behalf of Cloud customers, and the growth that we're seeing with GCP and the infrastructure work there, and then, of course, as both Sundar and Philipp talked about the a
GOOG_2024Q1_488.summary: The company is focusing on the Gemini foundational model and enhancing its Cloud services for customers, alongside growth in Google Cloud Platform (GCP) and related infrastructure efforts.

GOOG_2024Q1_487.speaker: Justin Post
GOOG_2024Q1_487.original_quote: Just first, you saw the big uptick the last 2 quarters, but you've been investing in AI for years.
GOOG_2024Q1_487.summary: The company has been investing in AI for years, and there has been a significant increase in activity over the last two quarters.

GOOG_2025Q1_491.speaker: Sundar Pichai
GOOG_2025Q1_491.original_quote: AI Overviews is going very well with over 1.5 billion users per month, and we are excited by the early positive reaction to AI Mode.
GOOG_2025Q1_491.summary: GOOG is reporting that AI Overviews is performing well with over 1.5 billion users per month, and they are pleased with the early positive feedback on AI Mode.

GOOG_2025Q1_495.speaker: Doug Thomas
GOOG_2025Q1_495.original_quote: Philip, maybe just to go back to AI overviews for a moment.
GOOG_2025Q1_495.summary: The speaker is referencing a previous discussion about AI overviews.

GOOG_2024Q1_485.speaker: Ruth Porat
GOOG_2024Q1_485.original_quote: And it really goes to Sundar's opening comment that we're very committed to making the investments required to keep us at the leading edge in technical infrastructure to support the growth in Cloud, all the innovation in Search that he and Philipp have spoken about and our lead with Gemini.
GOOG_2024Q1_485.summary: The company is committed to making investments in technical infrastructure to support growth in Cloud and innovation in Search, including their lead with Gemini.

GOOG_2025Q1_497.speaker: Eric Sheridan
GOOG_2025Q1_497.original_quote: You look across the consumer AI landscape today, how are you thinking about continuing to drive differentiation for Gemini as a platform through the lens of usage, utility, or putting product innovation at the forefront of driving consumer habits?
GOOG_2025Q1_497.summary: The company is focusing on driving differentiation for the Gemini platform by emphasizing usage, utility, and product innovation to influence consumer habits.

GOOG_2024Q1_490.speaker: Ross Sandler
GOOG_2024Q1_490.original_quote: Sundar, I had a question about smartphone-based AI searches.
GOOG_2024Q1_490.summary: The analyst is inquiring about smartphone-based AI searches.

GOOG_2024Q1_489.speaker: Sundar Pichai
GOOG_2024Q1_489.original_quote: I think the AI transformation is making everyone think about their whole stack, and we are engaged in a number of conversations.
GOOG_2024Q1_489.summary: The company is engaged in multiple conversations regarding the AI transformation and its impact on their entire stack.

GOOG_2025Q1_496.speaker: Philipp Schindler
GOOG_2025Q1_496.original_quote: On the ads in AI Overviews, late last year actually we launched them within the AI Overviews on mobile in the U.S.
GOOG_2025Q1_496.summary: The company launched ads within the AI Overviews feature on mobile in the U.S. late last year.

GOOG_2025Q1_498.speaker: Sundar Pichai
GOOG_2025Q1_498.original_quote: Obviously, it's an exciting moment on the AI front.
GOOG_2025Q1_498.summary: The company acknowledges that it is an exciting moment regarding AI developments.

GOOG_2025Q1_499.speaker: Ross Sandler
GOOG_2025Q1_499.original_quote: Sundar, it was disclosed this week in the trial that's going on that Gemini has 35 million daily active users, and I'm just curious, that number obviously trails by a pretty wide margin.
GOOG_2025Q1_499.summary: The quote mentions that Gemini has 35 million daily active users, indicating its current user engagement level.

GOOG_2025Q1_501.speaker: Mark Smolik
GOOG_2025Q1_501.original_quote: Sundar, appreciate the color on Gemini deployment across kind of that 15 products with half a billion users or more.
GOOG_2025Q1_501.summary: The company is deploying Gemini across 15 products that have over half a billion users.

GOOG_2025Q1_492.speaker: Philipp Schindler
GOOG_2025Q1_492.original_quote: Thanks to dozens of AI part improvements launched in 2024, businesses using DemandGen now see an average 26% year-on-year increase in conversions per dollar spent for goals like purchases and leads.
GOOG_2025Q1_492.summary: Google has launched dozens of AI part improvements in 2024, resulting in businesses using DemandGen experiencing an average 26% year-on-year increase in conversions per dollar spent for goals such as purchases and leads.

GOOG_2025Q1_500.speaker: Sundar Pichai
GOOG_2025Q1_500.original_quote: And again, I would reiterate, people are using, obviously, we have 1.5 billion users through AI overviews interacting with AI in a deep way, in a very engaged way.
GOOG_2025Q1_500.summary: The company reports that 1.5 billion users are interacting with AI overviews in a deep and engaged manner.

GOOG_2025Q1_493.speaker: Anat Ashkenazi
GOOG_2025Q1_493.original_quote: Turning to the Google Cloud segment, which continued to deliver very strong results this quarter, revenue increased by 28% to $12.3 billion in the first quarter, reflecting growth in GCP across core and AI products at a rate that was much higher than cloud's overall revenue growth rate.
GOOG_2025Q1_493.summary: Google Cloud's revenue increased by 28% to $12.3 billion, driven by growth in Google Cloud Platform (GCP) across core and AI products, outpacing the overall revenue growth rate of the cloud segment.

GOOG_2025Q1_503.speaker: Anat Ashkenazi
GOOG_2025Q1_503.original_quote: But we're continuing with pushing across the organization, leveraging Sundar mentioned, the use of AI and kind of an AI-first Google across several of our functions to help us manage a larger scope of work using our AI, AI agents, and AI tools.
GOOG_2025Q1_503.summary: The company is continuing to implement an AI-first approach across various functions to manage a larger scope of work using AI agents and tools.

GOOG_2025Q1_504.speaker: Ken Gawrelski
GOOG_2025Q1_504.original_quote: First on AI-powered search, you have a number of AI-powered search interfaces including three most prominently: AI Overviews, AI Mode, and Gemini.
GOOG_2025Q1_504.summary: Google is implementing several AI-powered search interfaces, specifically mentioning AI Overviews, AI Mode, and Gemini.

GOOG_2023Q4_474.speaker: Sundar Pichai
GOOG_2023Q4_474.original_quote: I believe AI presents opportunities for us in both organic search and monetization, and we are just at the beginning of this journey.
GOOG_2023Q4_474.summary: The company believes AI offers opportunities in organic search and monetization, indicating they are at the early stages of exploring these possibilities.

GOOG_2023Q4_472.speaker: Sundar Pichai
GOOG_2023Q4_472.original_quote: Generative AI is a new tool for us, but Search involves much more: it requires breadth, depth, diversity across different sectors, stability in execution, and access to rich, varied content online, all presented in an engaging manner.
GOOG_2023Q4_472.summary: Google is using generative AI as a new tool, but emphasizes that search requires a broader set of capabilities including diversity, stability, and access to varied content.

GOOG_2025Q1_505.speaker: Sundar Pichai
GOOG_2025Q1_505.original_quote: Now maybe on AI-powered Search and how do we see our consumer experience.
GOOG_2025Q1_505.summary: The company is focusing on AI-powered Search to enhance the consumer experience.

GOOG_2025Q2_507.speaker: Sundar Pichai
GOOG_2025Q2_507.original_quote: The Gemini app now has more than 450 million monthly active users, and we continue to see strong growth in engagement with daily requests growing over 50% from Q1.
GOOG_2025Q2_507.summary: The Gemini app has surpassed 450 million monthly active users, with daily requests increasing by over 50% since Q1.

GOOG_2025Q2_511.speaker: Sundar Pichai
GOOG_2025Q2_511.original_quote: The comprehensiveness of our AI portfolio and the breadth of our offerings, including our models on GPUs and TPUs for customers, has been driving demand.
GOOG_2025Q2_511.summary: Google is driving demand through the comprehensiveness of its AI portfolio and the breadth of its offerings, which include models on GPUs and TPUs for customers.

GOOG_2025Q1_506.speaker: Philipp Schindler
GOOG_2025Q1_506.original_quote: Mostly, we continue to help our customers really using our AI-powered tools.
GOOG_2025Q1_506.summary: The company is helping its customers utilize its AI-powered tools.

GOOG_2025Q2_508.speaker: Philipp Schindler
GOOG_2025Q2_508.original_quote: Advertisers that activate AI Max and Search campaigns typically see 14% more conversions.
GOOG_2025Q2_508.summary: Google's AI Max and Search campaigns lead to a 14% increase in conversions for advertisers who use them.

GOOG_2025Q2_513.speaker: Sundar Pichai
GOOG_2025Q2_513.original_quote: Regarding the second part, as it relates to internal efficiency using GenAI, we're currently rolling out agentic coding journeys for our software engineers.
GOOG_2025Q2_513.summary: The company is currently rolling out agentic coding journeys for their software engineers to improve internal efficiency using GenAI.

GOOG_2023Q3_460.speaker: Ken Gawrelski
GOOG_2023Q3_460.original_quote: First, how do you envision the future structure of AI-driven search capabilities?
GOOG_2023Q3_460.summary: The quote asks about the future structure of AI-driven search capabilities, indicating a focus on evolving search functionalities using AI.

GOOG_2025Q2_515.speaker: Sundar Pichai
GOOG_2025Q2_515.original_quote: AI, particularly, will enable a wave of innovation in this context.
GOOG_2025Q2_515.summary: The company states that AI will enable a wave of innovation.

GOOG_2025Q2_509.speaker: Anat Ashkenazi
GOOG_2025Q2_509.original_quote: Revenues increased by 32% to $13.6 billion in the second quarter, reflecting growth in GCP across core and AI products at a rate that was much higher than cloud's overall revenue growth and growth in Google Workspace driven by an increase in average revenue per seat and the number of seats.
GOOG_2025Q2_509.summary: Revenues increased by 32% to $13.6 billion, driven by growth in Google Cloud Platform (GCP) across core and AI products, which outpaced overall cloud revenue growth.

GOOG_2025Q2_514.speaker: Michael Nathanson
GOOG_2025Q2_514.original_quote: How significant do you think the cycle of new devices will be for scaling AI, and do you envision a future where these devices are essential to consumer experience?
GOOG_2025Q2_514.summary: The analyst is inquiring about the importance of new devices for scaling AI and whether these devices will be crucial for consumer experience in the future.

GOOG_2025Q2_518.speaker: Anat Ashkenazi
GOOG_2025Q2_518.original_quote: For instance, as Sundar mentioned, we're leveraging AI tools within the company to drive efficiency in how we run operations.
GOOG_2025Q2_518.summary: The company is leveraging AI tools internally to drive efficiency in its operations.

GOOG_2025Q2_510.speaker: Sundar Pichai
GOOG_2025Q2_510.original_quote: I don't think looking ahead, based on everything we are seeing, people are excited about AI.
GOOG_2025Q2_510.summary: The company indicates that, based on current observations, there is a lack of excitement among people regarding AI.

GOOG_2025Q1_494.speaker: Philipp Schindler
GOOG_2025Q1_494.original_quote: On the commercial query side, AI overviews continue to drive higher satisfaction and search usage.
GOOG_2025Q1_494.summary: Google is using AI overviews to enhance satisfaction and increase search usage on the commercial query side.

GOOG_2025Q2_512.speaker: Brian Nowak
GOOG_2025Q2_512.original_quote: Secondly, can you provide any updates on the internal efficiency you've seen from GenAI-enabled capabilities, as well as any friction points that need to be overcome for some of these internal tools?
GOOG_2025Q2_512.summary: The company is seeking updates on the internal efficiency gained from GenAI-enabled capabilities and is also inquiring about any challenges faced with these internal tools.

GOOG_2025Q2_520.speaker: Philipp Schindler
GOOG_2025Q2_520.original_quote: If I understood correctly, regarding AI Overviews, they continue to drive higher satisfaction and usage, scaling nicely to over 2 billion users across 200 countries.
GOOG_2025Q2_520.summary: Google's AI Overviews are driving higher satisfaction and usage, with over 2 billion users across 200 countries.

GOOG_2025Q2_519.speaker: Ross Sandler
GOOG_2025Q2_519.original_quote: As we look forward and we see lower ad impressions per SERP and all these changes with AI overviews, how do you feel about your ability to drive CTR going forward?
GOOG_2025Q2_519.summary: The quote mentions changes with AI overviews impacting ad impressions per search engine results page (SERP) and questions the company's ability to drive click-through rates (CTR) in the future.

GOOG_2025Q3_527.speaker: Anat Ashkenazi
GOOG_2025Q3_527.original_quote: R&D expenses increased by 22%, driven by compensation, and depreciation expenses related to our AI efforts.
GOOG_2025Q3_527.summary: The company increased R&D expenses by 22% due to compensation and depreciation expenses associated with their AI efforts.

GOOG_2025Q3_529.speaker: Philipp Schindler
GOOG_2025Q3_529.original_quote: And so maybe we go a little deeper on the shopping side where we actually use AI already very actively to improve the shopping experience.
GOOG_2025Q3_529.summary: The company is actively using AI to enhance the shopping experience.

GOOG_2025Q1_502.speaker: Sundar Pichai
GOOG_2025Q1_502.original_quote: I think the last time I had said the number was, like, 25% of code that's checked in involves people accepting AI suggested solutions.
GOOG_2025Q1_502.summary: The company reports that approximately 25% of code checked in involves developers accepting AI-suggested solutions.

GOOG_2025Q3_531.speaker: Douglas Anmuth
GOOG_2025Q3_531.original_quote: And I guess, in particular, when you think about AI Overviews and AI Mode, we know that query growth is accelerating.
GOOG_2025Q3_531.summary: The company is observing that query growth is accelerating, particularly in relation to AI Overviews and AI Mode.

GOOG_2025Q3_530.speaker: Sundar Pichai
GOOG_2025Q3_530.original_quote: And I think the possibility, as you said, of Gemini, particularly with the multimodal experience as well as services like YouTube, I think there's a real opportunity to make the in-car experience dramatically better.
GOOG_2025Q3_530.summary: Google is exploring the potential of Gemini, particularly its multimodal capabilities, to enhance the in-car experience alongside services like YouTube.

GOOG_2025Q2_521.speaker: Sundar Pichai
GOOG_2025Q2_521.original_quote: Regarding the second question about OpenAI, we are enthusiastic about partnering with them on Google Cloud.
GOOG_2025Q2_521.summary: Google is enthusiastic about partnering with OpenAI on Google Cloud.

GOOG_2025Q2_523.speaker: Justin Post
GOOG_2025Q2_523.original_quote: With Gemini 2.5 receiving positive reviews, how are you managing the Gemini subscriptions?
GOOG_2025Q2_523.summary: The company is managing subscriptions for Gemini 2.5, which has received positive reviews.

GOOG_2025Q2_524.speaker: Sundar Pichai
GOOG_2025Q2_524.original_quote: On the subscriptions, we are seeing positive traction with Google One, particularly with the introduction of AI plans.
GOOG_2025Q2_524.summary: Google is experiencing positive traction with Google One, especially following the introduction of AI plans.

GOOG_2025Q2_522.speaker: Sundar Pichai
GOOG_2025Q2_522.original_quote: Search is information-focused, while the Gemini app acts as a personal and proactive assistant.
GOOG_2025Q2_522.summary: The company is developing the Gemini app, which functions as a personal and proactive assistant, distinguishing it from traditional information-focused search.

GOOG_2025Q3_532.speaker: Philipp Schindler
GOOG_2025Q3_532.original_quote: We're now scaled to over 2 billion users here, and we're continuing to expand ads in AI Overviews in English to more countries, across desktop, mobile and so on.
GOOG_2025Q3_532.summary: Google is expanding ads in AI Overviews in English to more countries, reaching over 2 billion users across desktop and mobile platforms.

GOOG_2025Q3_526.speaker: Philipp Schindler
GOOG_2025Q3_526.original_quote: After turning on AI Max and Search, they grew their conversion value by 12% in early tests.
GOOG_2025Q3_526.summary: The company is using AI Max and Search, which resulted in a 12% increase in conversion value during early tests.

GOOG_2025Q3_525.speaker: Sundar Pichai
GOOG_2025Q3_525.original_quote: Our revenue number has doubled since then, and we are firmly in the generative AI era.
GOOG_2025Q3_525.summary: The company states that its revenue has doubled and emphasizes that it is firmly in the generative AI era.

GOOG_2025Q3_534.speaker: Sundar Pichai
GOOG_2025Q3_534.original_quote: Eric, I would say we are experiencing significant demand for our AI infrastructure products, including TPU-based and GPU-based solutions.
GOOG_2025Q3_534.summary: The company is experiencing significant demand for its AI infrastructure products, which include TPU-based and GPU-based solutions.

GOOG_2025Q3_533.speaker: Anat Ashkenazi
GOOG_2025Q3_533.original_quote: Sundar mentioned on a previous call the productivity gains from leveraging AI at Google.
GOOG_2025Q3_533.summary: Google is leveraging AI to achieve productivity gains.

GOOG_2025Q3_535.speaker: Mark Shmulik
GOOG_2025Q3_535.original_quote: Sundar, with the strong adoption of Gemini, AI Mode and Overviews across the user base, are there any meaningful differences to call out kind of around the behavior and depth of engagement for those users across the entire Google ecosystem?
GOOG_2025Q3_535.summary: The quote mentions the strong adoption of Gemini, AI Mode, and Overviews among users across the Google ecosystem, suggesting a positive impact on user engagement.

GOOG_2025Q3_543.speaker: Sundar Pichai
GOOG_2025Q3_543.original_quote: And the only thing I would add is just stepping back broadly, I think AI Overviews and AI Mode are dramatically improving search.
GOOG_2025Q3_543.summary: The company is improving search through AI Overviews and AI Mode, which are having a dramatic impact.

GOOG_2025Q3_544.speaker: Kenneth Gawrelski
GOOG_2025Q3_544.original_quote: First, it's becoming increasingly evident that new modes like Google with Gemini Overview, AI Overviews, and AI Mode, as well as ChatGPT, are expanding the market for engagement and search-like behavior.
GOOG_2025Q3_544.summary: Google is recognizing that new modes such as Gemini Overview and AI Mode are expanding the market for engagement and search-like behavior.

GOOG_2025Q3_545.speaker: Sundar Pichai
GOOG_2025Q3_545.original_quote: Search is evolving, and through AI Overviews and AI Mode, we aim to offer a diverse range of experiences.
GOOG_2025Q3_545.summary: The company is evolving its search capabilities by introducing AI Overviews and AI Mode to provide a diverse range of experiences.

GOOG_2025Q3_536.speaker: Sundar Pichai
GOOG_2025Q3_536.original_quote: Mark, I think AI Overviews are clearly an integral part of the Google experience, leading to very high engagement.
GOOG_2025Q3_536.summary: Google is integrating AI Overviews into its services, which is resulting in very high user engagement.

GOOG_2025Q3_546.speaker: Justin Post
GOOG_2025Q3_546.original_quote: Sundar, I think you mentioned Gemini 3 is coming.
GOOG_2025Q3_546.summary: The quote mentions that Gemini 3 is anticipated to be released, as referenced by Sundar.

GOOG_2024Q1_484.speaker: Sundar Pichai
GOOG_2024Q1_484.original_quote: And we've been rolling out AI overviews in the U.S.
GOOG_2024Q1_484.summary: The company is rolling out AI overviews in the U.S.

GOOG_2025Q3_538.speaker: Michael Nathanson
GOOG_2025Q3_538.original_quote: Philipp, it's evident that when users engage with AI Mode, the queries are significantly longer.
GOOG_2025Q3_538.summary: The company is observing that user queries become significantly longer when engaging with AI Mode.

GOOG_2025Q3_547.speaker: Sundar Pichai
GOOG_2025Q3_547.original_quote: Nonetheless, I believe the underlying pace of development is remarkable, and I am looking forward to our Gemini 3.0 release later this year.
GOOG_2025Q3_547.summary: The company is looking forward to the release of Gemini 3.0 later this year, highlighting the remarkable pace of development in AI.

GOOG_2025Q3_541.speaker: Ross Sandler
GOOG_2025Q3_541.original_quote: About 20% of Google's search queries are commercial historically, and you've talked a bunch on this call about how AI Overviews are kind of expanding the breadth of queries.
GOOG_2025Q3_541.summary: Google is expanding the breadth of search queries through AI Overviews, which are enhancing the way users interact with search results.

GOOG_2025Q3_540.speaker: Anat Ashkenazi
GOOG_2025Q3_540.original_quote: We are already seeing significant returns from our Cloud business, generating billions from AI this quarter.
GOOG_2025Q3_540.summary: The company is generating billions from its Cloud business due to AI this quarter.

GOOG_2025Q3_539.speaker: Philipp Schindler
GOOG_2025Q3_539.original_quote: Look, as Sundar shared, AI Mode now has over like 75 million daily active users in the U.S., and we see a strong and consistent week-over-week growth in usage since launch, and the queries doubled over the quarter.
GOOG_2025Q3_539.summary: Google's AI Mode has over 75 million daily active users in the U.S., with strong week-over-week growth in usage and a doubling of queries over the quarter since its launch.

GOOG_2025Q3_542.speaker: Philipp Schindler

ADI_2024Q4_697.speaker: Vincent Roche

APH_2025Q4_695.speaker: Adam Norwitt

ADI_2024Q4_699.speaker: Richard Puccio

ADI_2025Q2_708.speaker: Rich Puccio

ADI_2025Q4_715.speaker: Richard Puccio

ADI_2025Q3_712.speaker: Vincent T. Roche

ADI_2025Q4_714.speaker: Vincent Roche

AAPL_2025Q1_798.summary: The quote mentions challenges Apple faces in China, particularly regarding shifting preferences for Western technology brands, but does not specifically address AI.

AVGO_2023Q1_1208.summary: AVGO acknowledges that their cloud customers are actively concentrating on the development and deployment of generative AI within their data centers.

AVGO_2023Q1_1213.speaker: Hock Tan
AVGO_2023Q1_1213.original_quote: What I do know is that in certain areas of their operations, we are witnessing a heightened sense of urgency and focus, particularly in relation to spending as they aim to keep up with the excitement surrounding generative AI applications and workloads.

AVGO_2023Q2_1216.speaker: Hock Tan

AVGO_2023Q1_1214.speaker: Pierre Ferragu
AVGO_2023Q1_1214.original_quote: Just to clarify, is it fair to assume that the majority of your growth this year in networking will come from AI, with $600 million from AI Ethernet and $1 billion from other sources, or is that not the right way to think about it?

AVGO_2023Q1_1205.speaker: Hock Tan
AVGO_2023Q1_1205.original_quote: In fact, we estimated that our Ethernet switch shipments for AI deployments exceeded $200 million in 2022, with expectations to rise to over $800 million in 2023 due to increasing demand from hyperscale customers.
AVGO_2023Q1_1205.summary: AVGO estimated that their Ethernet switch shipments for AI deployments exceeded $200 million in 2022 and expect this to rise to over $800 million in 2023 due to increasing demand from hyperscale customers.

AVGO_2023Q1_1206.summary: The quote mentions $200 million in Ethernet revenue related to AI and discusses the use of InfiniBand for generative models, along with $2 billion in compute offload projected to reach $3 billion.

AVGO_2023Q1_1207.speaker: Hock Tan
AVGO_2023Q1_1207.original_quote: In 2022, we estimate that AI workloads in hyperscale environments accounted for around $200 million worth of silicon, Ethernet switches, and fabric in those AI networks.
AVGO_2023Q1_1207.summary: AVGO estimates that in 2022, AI workloads in hyperscale environments generated approximately $200 million in revenue from silicon, Ethernet switches, and fabric used in AI networks.

AVGO_2023Q2_1221.speaker: Hock Tan

AVGO_2023Q2_1227.summary: AVGO is experiencing growth in AI due to the networking components it provides for building Ethernet fabrics for AI clusters.

AVGO_2023Q2_1220.speaker: Hock Tan
AVGO_2023Q2_1220.original_quote: You are correct that this type of AI product, including both next-generation and current generative AI products, relies on cutting-edge technologies in silicon wafers and packaging, such as memory stacking.
AVGO_2023Q2_1220.summary: AVGO is developing AI products that depend on advanced technologies in silicon wafers and packaging, including memory stacking for both next-generation and current generative AI products.

AVGO_2023Q2_1231.original_quote: You're discussing general AI and the rising demand from hyperscale customers.

BMY_2025Q3_1203.original_quote: With the advent of AI and new tools, it is essential we adopt these innovations.
BMY_2025Q3_1203.summary: The company is adopting innovations related to AI and new tools.

AVGO_2023Q2_1225.original_quote: While our growth in AI revenue contributes to overall growth, it does not account for all of it.

AVGO_2023Q2_1226.summary: AVGO is focusing on custom silicon opportunities that support cloud AI initiatives.

AVGO_2023Q2_1233.summary: The analyst is inquiring about the performance improvement or content uplift that Broadcom experiences when using AI servers as opposed to general compute servers.

AVGO_2023Q2_1232.speaker: Hock Tan
AVGO_2023Q2_1232.original_quote: It will support a bandwidth of up to 51 terabits per second, making it ideal for high-demand AI networks, particularly those utilizing over 32,000 GPU clusters operating at 800 gigabits per second.
AVGO_2023Q2_1232.summary: The company is developing technology that supports a bandwidth of up to 51 terabits per second, which is particularly suited for high-demand AI networks that use over 32,000 GPU clusters operating at 800 gigabits per second.

AVGO_2023Q3_1236.speaker: Vivek Arya
AVGO_2023Q3_1236.original_quote: Hock, my question has to do with your large AI ASIC compute offload contract.
AVGO_2023Q3_1236.summary: AVGO is involved in a large AI ASIC compute offload contract.

AVGO_2023Q2_1229.speaker: Hock Tan
AVGO_2023Q2_1229.original_quote: For fiscal '24, we believe AI could represent over 25% of our semiconductor revenue, but we have many solid foundations for the rest of our semiconductor business.
AVGO_2023Q2_1229.summary: AVGO believes that AI could represent over 25% of their semiconductor revenue for fiscal '24, indicating a significant contribution from AI to their overall business.

AVGO_2023Q3_1238.speaker: Ross Seymore
AVGO_2023Q3_1238.original_quote: Hock, I want to stick with the networking segment and just get a little more color on the AI demand that you talked about growing so significantly sequentially in the fourth quarter.
AVGO_2023Q3_1238.summary: The company is observing significant sequential growth in AI demand within the networking segment for the fourth quarter.

AVGO_2023Q3_1248.speaker: Hock Tan
AVGO_2023Q3_1248.original_quote: We have one major customer in AI engines.

AVGO_2023Q3_1247.speaker: Matthew Ramsay
AVGO_2023Q3_1247.original_quote: However, there are several other large hyperscale customers considering custom silicon, possibly influenced by the recent surge in Gen AI spending.
AVGO_2023Q3_1247.summary: AVGO notes that several large hyperscale customers are considering custom silicon, likely due to the recent increase in spending on Generative AI.

AVGO_2023Q3_1240.original_quote: If I take that sort of $6 billion non-AI run rate and I calculate what the AI is, I'm actually getting that 15% of semiconductor revenue that you mentioned last quarter.
AVGO_2023Q3_1240.summary: The analyst calculates that AI contributes to 15% of the semiconductor revenue, based on a $6 billion non-AI run rate.

AVGO_2023Q3_1239.speaker: Hock Tan
AVGO_2023Q3_1239.original_quote: Nowadays, AI engines for generative AI are not deployed individually; they are utilized in large clusters, as described by some hyperscalers.

AVGO_2023Q3_1242.summary: The analyst is asking Hock about whether the supply environment is a limiting factor for Broadcom's AI business.

AVGO_2023Q3_1241.speaker: Hock Tan
AVGO_2023Q3_1241.original_quote: To address your question, we have previously indicated that we believe AI revenue will account for over 25% of our semiconductor revenue in fiscal year 2024.
AVGO_2023Q3_1241.summary: AVGO has indicated that they believe AI revenue will account for over 25% of their semiconductor revenue in fiscal year 2024.

AVGO_2023Q3_1243.speaker: Hock Tan
AVGO_2023Q3_1243.original_quote: On the first question regarding the supply chain, the products for generative AI, whether for networking or customer engines, have long lead times.
AVGO_2023Q3_1243.summary: AVGO is addressing the supply chain challenges related to products for generative AI, specifically for networking and customer engines, which have long lead times.

AVGO_2023Q3_1244.speaker: Hock Tan
AVGO_2023Q3_1244.original_quote: Even though we have a 50-week lead time, I see a lot of bookings tied to generative AI and a decent amount related to wireless as well.
AVGO_2023Q3_1244.summary: AVGO is experiencing a significant amount of bookings related to generative AI, despite having a 50-week lead time.

AVGO_2023Q3_1250.speaker: Hock Tan
AVGO_2023Q3_1250.original_quote: The data you’re seeing, especially regarding broadband and service storage, might appear somewhat flat, and that’s why I emphasized considering the broader picture without factoring in generative AI.

AVGO_2023Q3_1237.speaker: Hock Tan
AVGO_2023Q3_1237.original_quote: Our relationship involves a multi-year strategic engagement across multiple leading-edge technologies, which are essential for developing their desired products, whether in wireless or, in this context, generative AI.

CIEN_2023Q1_1559.original_quote: With respect to demand, we remain positive about the fundamental drivers, including 5G, cloud, AI, and automation and continue to believe that they are very durable over the long term.
CIEN_2023Q1_1559.summary: The company remains positive about demand driven by AI among other factors, believing these drivers are durable over the long term.

CIEN_2023Q1_1560.speaker: Meta Marshall
CIEN_2023Q1_1560.original_quote: And then second, just given the topical nature of it right now, just wondering how you guys see the AI opportunity for DCI and whether it's relatively small because it's mostly in data center traffic or whether you think that could be an additional growth driver for you guys?
CIEN_2023Q1_1560.summary: The analyst is inquiring about the potential AI opportunity for DCI and whether it could serve as a growth driver, considering its focus on data center traffic.

CIEN_2023Q2_1562.speaker: Gary Smith
CIEN_2023Q2_1562.original_quote: And of course, AI could prove to be transformative for service providers and cloud providers alike on top of these existing dynamics.
CIEN_2023Q2_1562.summary: CIEN states that AI has the potential to be transformative for service providers and cloud providers, building on existing dynamics.

CIEN_2023Q1_1561.speaker: Scott McFeely
CIEN_2023Q1_1561.original_quote: Meta, on your AI question, you're right.
CIEN_2023Q1_1561.summary: The company acknowledges a question related to AI posed by Meta, indicating awareness or engagement with AI topics.

CHD_2023Q4_1557.speaker: Surabhi Pokhriyal
CHD_2023Q4_1557.original_quote: The integration of AI in Marketing Technology has also accelerated our creative processes, enabling us to produce content much more rapidly.
CHD_2023Q4_1557.summary: The company is integrating AI in Marketing Technology to accelerate creative processes and produce content more rapidly.

CIEN_2023Q2_1563.speaker: Meta Marshall
CIEN_2023Q2_1563.original_quote: Additionally, have you noticed any changes in the cloud architecture as Generative AI traffic starts to alter data center traffic patterns?
CIEN_2023Q2_1563.summary: The analyst is inquiring about changes in cloud architecture due to the impact of Generative AI on data center traffic patterns.

CIEN_2023Q2_1564.speaker: James Moylan
CIEN_2023Q2_1564.original_quote: We believe this technology is incredibly exciting, and with the advent of Generative AI, it is poised to change the world.
CIEN_2023Q2_1564.summary: The company believes that Generative AI technology is incredibly exciting and is poised to change the world.

CIEN_2023Q4_1571.speaker: Amit Daryanani
CIEN_2023Q4_1571.original_quote: And if you actually see any signs of AI-centric infrastructure tailwinds benefiting your business already.
CIEN_2023Q4_1571.summary: The quote inquires whether the company is experiencing any benefits from AI-centric infrastructure tailwinds in their business.

CIEN_2023Q3_1565.speaker: Gary Smith
CIEN_2023Q3_1565.original_quote: These include mobility, 5G, cloud, automation, and more recently, artificial intelligence applications as they move out towards the network.
CIEN_2023Q3_1565.summary: The company is incorporating artificial intelligence applications into their network offerings, alongside mobility, 5G, cloud, and automation.

CIEN_2023Q4_1572.speaker: Ruben Roy
CIEN_2023Q4_1572.original_quote: I'm wondering, as you get closer to your cloud customers and you start thinking about AI traffic relative to historical bandwidth growth, would you say at this point that AI traffic would be incremental to the 30% plus growth that we've seen historically?
CIEN_2023Q4_1572.summary: The analyst is inquiring whether AI traffic will contribute additional growth beyond the historical bandwidth growth of over 30%.

CIEN_2023Q4_1569.speaker: Gary Smith
CIEN_2023Q4_1569.original_quote: Taking a perspective around customer segments, clearly we had a record quarter with cloud providers as they continue to invest in data center interconnect for their traditional business and begin to provision their networks for AI-related traffic.
CIEN_2023Q4_1569.summary: The company had a record quarter with cloud providers who are investing in data center interconnect to support their traditional business and prepare their networks for AI-related traffic.

CIEN_2023Q3_1566.speaker: David Vogt
CIEN_2023Q3_1566.original_quote: Is it just under investment and optimization that’s been transpiring for the last four to six quarters, or is it maybe AI related or a combination of maybe the digestion in AI?
CIEN_2023Q3_1566.summary: The analyst is questioning whether the current underinvestment and optimization trends are due to AI-related factors or a combination of AI digestion and other issues.

CIEN_2023Q3_1567.speaker: Gary Smith
CIEN_2023Q3_1567.original_quote: And the specific things that we’re seeing for Q4, which are new orders to be shipped in Q4 in addition to their existing backlog that we’ve got, was driven by really the need to start preparing for machine learning and AI traffic coming out of the data center.
CIEN_2023Q3_1567.summary: The company is seeing new orders driven by the need to prepare for machine learning and AI traffic from data centers in Q4, in addition to their existing backlog.

CIEN_2023Q4_1570.speaker: James Moylan
CIEN_2023Q4_1570.original_quote: Looking ahead, we anticipate a return to normalized order patterns as we go through 2024, and foresee AI as a growing driver of bandwidth growth.
CIEN_2023Q4_1570.summary: CIEN anticipates AI will be a growing driver of bandwidth growth as they look ahead to 2024 and expect a return to normalized order patterns.

CMG_2023Q3_1550.speaker: David Palmer
CMG_2023Q3_1550.original_quote: You're obviously finding some traction on just paying attention to how you deploy labor and some of the things you're doing even with computer vision and whatnot.
CMG_2023Q3_1550.summary: The company is deploying labor more effectively by utilizing computer vision technology.

CIEN_2023Q3_1568.speaker: Gary Smith
CIEN_2023Q3_1568.original_quote: And I think if you look at the dynamics around machine learning and AI, et cetera, and who knows how that will play out and the timing of it and the modeling of the network piece.
CIEN_2023Q3_1568.summary: The company is considering the dynamics of machine learning and AI and is uncertain about how it will develop and impact network modeling.

CIEN_2023Q4_1573.speaker: Gary Smith
CIEN_2023Q4_1573.original_quote: One industry analyst recently came out with a view of a higher growth rate by, you know, 5% to 6% in terms of bandwidth demand as a result of AI.
CIEN_2023Q4_1573.summary: The company mentions that an industry analyst predicts a 5% to 6% increase in bandwidth demand due to AI.

CIEN_2023Q4_1574.speaker: James Moylan
CIEN_2023Q4_1574.original_quote: The data center, particularly with AI, is where we have no exposure right now.
CIEN_2023Q4_1574.summary: The company currently has no exposure in the data center market, especially in relation to AI.

CDW_2024Q3_1520.speaker: Al Miralles
CDW_2024Q3_1520.original_quote: It's been less in the way of Win 11 drivers and less in the way of AI PCs.
CDW_2024Q3_1520.summary: The company is experiencing a decrease in demand for Windows 11 drivers and AI PCs.

CIEN_2025Q1_1575.speaker: Gary Smith
CIEN_2025Q1_1575.original_quote: As we execute our strategy to take full advantage of the growth of cloud and AI traffic.
CIEN_2025Q1_1575.summary: The company is executing its strategy to fully leverage the growth of cloud and AI traffic.

CDNS_2025Q2_1450.speaker: Harlan L. Sur
CDNS_2025Q2_1450.original_quote: If I look at many of the AI xPU, ASIC, and merchant chip design programs that are in development right now, many of them are looking to transition from 2.5D to 3.5D advanced packaging architectures, which includes chip stacking.
CDNS_2025Q2_1450.summary: The company is observing that many AI xPU, ASIC, and merchant chip design programs are transitioning from 2.5D to 3.5D advanced packaging architectures, which involves chip stacking.

CIEN_2025Q1_1576.speaker: Jim Moylan
CIEN_2025Q1_1576.original_quote: And we are very confident in our well-established position, as the global leader in high speed connectivity as both our service provider and cloud provider customers invest at scale and monetize their networks in the AI era.
CIEN_2025Q1_1576.summary: CIEN is confident in its position as a global leader in high-speed connectivity, as service provider and cloud provider customers are investing significantly and monetizing their networks in the AI era.

CIEN_2025Q3_1585.speaker: Gary Smith
CIEN_2025Q3_1585.original_quote: I think increasingly, obviously, it's driven by AI workloads.
CIEN_2025Q3_1585.summary: The company indicates that its operations are increasingly driven by AI workloads.

CIEN_2025Q3_1589.speaker: Gary Smith
CIEN_2025Q3_1589.original_quote: And when you think about it, so much investment has gone into AI in its various forms, the GPU accelerators, LLMs, data centers and all infrastructure about that.
CIEN_2025Q3_1589.summary: The company acknowledges the significant investment made in AI, including GPU accelerators, large language models (LLMs), data centers, and related infrastructure.

CIEN_2025Q1_1577.speaker: Gary Smith
CIEN_2025Q1_1577.summary: The company is implementing machine-to-machine learning.

CIEN_2025Q2_1580.speaker: Jim Moylan
CIEN_2025Q2_1580.original_quote: This is being driven by AI momentum and an improving service provider environment.
CIEN_2025Q2_1580.summary: The company is experiencing growth driven by AI momentum and an improving service provider environment.

CIEN_2025Q2_1579.speaker: Gary Smith
CIEN_2025Q2_1579.original_quote: This really highlights the accelerating investments in AI infrastructure and our leadership in addressing this demand.
CIEN_2025Q2_1579.summary: The company is highlighting its accelerating investments in AI infrastructure and its leadership in meeting the demand for such infrastructure.

CIEN_2025Q1_1578.speaker: Scott McFeely
CIEN_2025Q1_1578.original_quote: To start, our traditional strengths in long haul, submarine, and metro regional networks are experiencing significant demand for increased traffic, driven by the cloud and AI trends we've discussed.
CIEN_2025Q1_1578.summary: The company is experiencing significant demand for increased traffic in their traditional strengths due to trends in cloud and AI.

CIEN_2025Q3_1584.speaker: Gary Smith
CIEN_2025Q3_1584.original_quote: And in summary, we are seeing strong broad-based growth across our portfolio, driven by accelerated demand from AI workloads related to cloud traffic and steadily improving service provider investments.
CIEN_2025Q3_1584.summary: The company is experiencing strong growth across its portfolio, which is driven by increased demand from AI workloads associated with cloud traffic and improving investments from service providers.

CIEN_2025Q3_1583.speaker: Gary Smith
CIEN_2025Q3_1583.original_quote: The step function increase in orders we've seen in recent quarters really underscores how the network is now fundamental to the underpinning, growth and monetization of AI.
CIEN_2025Q3_1583.summary: The company highlights that the increase in orders reflects the network's essential role in supporting the growth and monetization of AI.

CIEN_2025Q3_1588.speaker: Amit Daryanani
CIEN_2025Q3_1588.original_quote: And then when I started listening to you talk about some of the big wins you've had on the AI side, especially the out-of-band networking management and the CieloCross win, it almost sounds like you're starting to co-develop and co-design some of these solutions with your customers.
CIEN_2025Q3_1588.summary: CIEN is co-developing and co-designing AI solutions with customers, particularly in out-of-band networking management and the CieloCross win.

CIEN_2025Q4_1591.speaker: Gary Smith
CIEN_2025Q4_1591.original_quote: Combined, these advantages have positioned and will continue to position Ciena Corporation to deliver value in the AI ecosystem, serving both cloud and service provider customers for many years to come.
CIEN_2025Q4_1591.summary: Ciena Corporation is positioned to deliver value in the AI ecosystem for cloud and service provider customers for many years to come.

CIEN_2025Q2_1581.speaker: Ruben Roy

CIEN_2025Q2_1581.summary: The company is experiencing momentum related to AGENTIC AI and is aware of customer interests in this area.

CIEN_2025Q3_1590.speaker: Gary Smith
CIEN_2025Q3_1590.original_quote: And then you're leaning in on all the AI workloads.

CIEN_2025Q2_1582.speaker: Gary Smith
CIEN_2025Q2_1582.original_quote: And really without that, it's very difficult to, you know, have a GenTek AI if you haven't, you know, understood what the whole inventory of your network is.

CIEN_2025Q4_1593.speaker: Gary Smith
CIEN_2025Q4_1593.original_quote: We remain very focused on our strategy and continue to deliver the world's best high-speed connectivity that really underpins today's AI-driven environment.
CIEN_2025Q4_1593.summary: The company is focused on delivering high-speed connectivity that supports the current AI-driven environment.

CI_2023Q2_1597.speaker: David Cordani

CTAS_2025Q4_1601.summary: Cintas is currently using AI primarily as a cost-related tool.

CIEN_2025Q4_1592.summary: The company is experiencing increased confidence and visibility due to AI-driven dynamics, which allowed them to provide an early outlook for 2026.

CIEN_2025Q4_1594.speaker: Gary Smith
