FFIV_2024Q1_2419.speaker: Francois Locoh-Donou
FFIV_2024Q1_2419.original_quote: We are going to use this event to discuss the hybrid multi-cloud challenges faced by large organizations worldwide including the implications of AI on applications, APIs and security.

FFIV_2024Q1_2418.speaker: Francois Locoh-Donou
FFIV_2024Q1_2418.original_quote: This complexity is further intensified by the rapid growth in the number of applications, a growth trajectory that is poised to accelerate significantly with the widespread adoption and proliferation of AI.
FFIV_2024Q1_2418.summary: The company notes that the rapid growth in the number of applications is expected to accelerate significantly due to the widespread adoption and proliferation of AI.

FFIV_2023Q3_2410.original_quote: In the AI space, we are focused on enhancing our productivity by leveraging new capabilities.

FFIV_2023Q4_2412.speaker: Francois Locoh-Donou
FFIV_2023Q4_2412.original_quote: At the macro level, we expect continued application and API growth, fueled by automation efforts and new use cases, including Generative AI.

FFIV_2023Q4_2416.speaker: Meta Marshall
FFIV_2023Q4_2416.original_quote: And then maybe as a second question, you know, you mentioned kind of having plays as AI and inference cases grow; is that going to require productization of any kind of suites of products today or just kind of tailoring to kind of have AI ready solution?
FFIV_2023Q4_2416.summary: The company is considering whether the growth of AI and inference cases will necessitate the productization of new product suites or if they can tailor existing solutions to be AI-ready.

FFIV_2024Q2_2428.speaker: Francis Pelzer
FFIV_2024Q2_2428.original_quote: We do see AI having a big boost in application demand over the coming years, but it's not something that we expect a ton of revenue in FY '24 from.

FFIV_2024Q2_2427.original_quote: So far, we have not observed customers making AI a priority yet, as most enterprises are still not allocating substantial budgets to AI at this stage.
FFIV_2024Q2_2427.summary: The company has not seen customers prioritizing AI, as most enterprises are not allocating significant budgets to AI at this time.

FFIV_2024Q2_2421.speaker: Francois Locoh-Donou
FFIV_2024Q2_2421.original_quote: These challenges will be further intensified by the inevitable widespread adoption and proliferation of AI.
FFIV_2024Q2_2421.summary: The company acknowledges that challenges will be intensified by the widespread adoption and proliferation of AI.

FFIV_2024Q1_2420.speaker: Francois Locoh-Donou
FFIV_2024Q1_2420.original_quote: So our view on AI, so we have started seeing this quarter kind of the first emerging AI use cases of AI workloads that either needed to be traffic-managed or load-balanced or required some security.
FFIV_2024Q1_2420.summary: FFIV has started seeing emerging AI use cases this quarter that involve traffic management, load balancing, or security for AI workloads.

EXR_2024Q4_2402.speaker: Ronald Kamdem
EXR_2024Q4_2402.original_quote: Then my second one, obviously, it's early to talk about AI, but you guys have always been sort of front-footed on the technology front.
EXR_2024Q4_2402.summary: The analyst notes that it is early to discuss AI, but acknowledges that the company has been proactive regarding technology advancements.

FFIV_2024Q2_2422.original_quote: Broad-based enterprise adoption of AI will only compound these challenges.

FFIV_2024Q2_2424.summary: FFIV is focusing on high-capacity load balancing for data ingestion, specifically for enterprises that operate large language models and require substantial data ingestion from various environments.

FFIV_2024Q2_2430.original_quote: Let me address the question on AI and the types of attacks.

FFIV_2025Q3_2433.speaker: François Locoh-Donou

FFIV_2025Q3_2433.summary: F5 is offering an application delivery and security platform that provides AI-driven insights, along with consistent policies and full visibility.

FFIV_2025Q3_2435.summary: The company is experiencing influences on its hardware business from growing investments in AI readiness and use cases, alongside trends like hybrid multi-cloud architectures and data center modernization.

FFIV_2025Q4_2438.summary: The company is experiencing growth due to demand for enterprise AI infrastructure, alongside data center reinvestment and hybrid cloud adoption.

FDS_2023Q3_2445.summary: The company used ChatGPT to create summaries of CallStreet earnings call transcripts, which decreased the time taken for summarization by more than 90%.

FDS_2023Q3_2447.speaker: Phil Snow
FDS_2023Q3_2447.original_quote: The way we are currently thinking about generative AI is that it will significantly enhance FactSet’s search capabilities, thus improving the end-user experience and allowing us to take additional market share while boosting retention.
FDS_2023Q3_2447.summary: FactSet is currently enhancing its search capabilities using generative AI, which will improve the end-user experience and help the company gain additional market share while boosting retention.

FDS_2025Q2_2448.summary: The company is experiencing strong new business and expansion activities, especially with AI-focused FinTech partners.

EXPE_2025Q2_2391.original_quote: Major migrations and platform changes can sometimes slow us down, but what excites me right now is how we are leveraging AI internally to be more efficient and agile.
EXPE_2025Q2_2391.summary: The company is leveraging AI internally to improve efficiency and agility, despite facing challenges from major migrations and platform changes.

FDS_2025Q2_2451.speaker: Phil Snow
FDS_2025Q2_2451.original_quote: So that’s really taking the ability to take what you can do in FactSet to search with AI capabilities and plugging it into your own environment and we’re seeing receptivity for that across all firm types.
FDS_2025Q2_2451.summary: FactSet is integrating AI capabilities into its search functionality, allowing users to incorporate these features into their own environments. The company is observing positive receptivity to this integration across various types of firms.

FDS_2025Q2_2449.speaker: Helen Shan
FDS_2025Q2_2449.original_quote: This was primarily driven by a 31% increase in technology-related spend due to higher cloud and software expenses and greater amortization of internal used software, reflecting our ongoing investment in Generative AI.
FDS_2025Q2_2449.summary: The company is experiencing a 31% increase in technology-related spending, which is attributed to higher cloud and software expenses as well as greater amortization of internal used software, indicating ongoing investment in Generative AI.

FDS_2025Q2_2455.speaker: Helen Shan
FDS_2025Q2_2455.original_quote: This is part of our consistent investment back into the business in technology and Gen AI and funding that through rationalization of cost of our existing expense base.
FDS_2025Q2_2455.summary: The company is consistently investing in technology and generative AI, funded through the rationalization of their existing expense base.

FDS_2025Q3_2463.summary: The company appreciates the discussion on monetizing Generative AI and notes some success in revenue growth related to it.

FDS_2025Q3_2460.speaker: Helen Shan
FDS_2025Q3_2460.original_quote: Technology-related expenses increased 21%, reflecting the higher amortization of internal-use software and our ongoing investment in generative AI capabilities.
FDS_2025Q3_2460.summary: The company is investing in generative AI capabilities, which has contributed to a 21% increase in technology-related expenses due to higher amortization of internal-use software.

FDS_2025Q3_2464.original_quote: So yes, we're certainly very focused now on using AI internally.
FDS_2025Q3_2464.summary: The company is focused on using AI internally.

FDS_2025Q2_2453.speaker: Phil Snow
FDS_2025Q2_2453.original_quote: Very often now, we’re constructing agreements where clients can really take value from FactSet any way they want, whether it’s through the desktop, analytics, an API, Gen AI, or some other provider.
FDS_2025Q2_2453.summary: FactSet is constructing agreements that allow clients to derive value from their services through various channels, including Gen AI.

FDS_2025Q2_2457.speaker: Goran Skoko
FDS_2025Q2_2457.original_quote: And I think some of that in general, I think a lot of the conversations are about our Gen AI tools in that space and the conversations have been good.
FDS_2025Q2_2457.summary: The company is having positive conversations regarding its Generative AI tools in the relevant space.

FDS_2025Q3_2465.speaker: Helen Shan
FDS_2025Q3_2465.original_quote: Additionally, with AI-generated fund descriptions, we've managed to complete those projects in a third of the time, resulting in improved quality.
FDS_2025Q3_2465.summary: FDS is using AI-generated fund descriptions to complete projects in a third of the time, which has led to improved quality.

FDS_2025Q2_2458.speaker: Phil Snow
FDS_2025Q2_2458.original_quote: So, I just want to really stress, like for our banking clients the combination of the technology, the integration with office, the Gen AI work we’re doing, as well as the data is just such a powerful combination and obviously it’s a lot to do with the banks wanting to renew with FactSet.
FDS_2025Q2_2458.summary: FactSet is emphasizing the powerful combination of their technology, integration with office tools, and generative AI work, which is driving banks to renew their contracts with the company.

FDS_2025Q3_2462.speaker: Helen Shan
FDS_2025Q3_2462.original_quote: As we began the year, we outlined our investment strategy focused on three key areas: expanding our data capabilities, integrating more deeply into client workflows, and advancing our GenAI roadmap.
FDS_2025Q3_2462.summary: The company is advancing its GenAI roadmap as part of its investment strategy, which also includes expanding data capabilities and integrating into client workflows.

FDS_2025Q3_2467.speaker: David Motemaden
FDS_2025Q3_2467.original_quote: I wanted to clarify where we stand regarding the 30 to 50 basis points ASV contribution from GenAI this year.
FDS_2025Q3_2467.summary: The company is clarifying that they expect a contribution of 30 to 50 basis points to their Annual Subscription Value (ASV) from Generative AI this year.

FDS_2025Q3_2466.speaker: Toni Kaplan
FDS_2025Q3_2466.original_quote: I wanted to ask about the offensive GenAI generation.
FDS_2025Q3_2466.summary: The analyst is inquiring about the offensive capabilities of generative AI within the company.

FDS_2025Q2_2456.speaker: Phil Snow
FDS_2025Q2_2456.original_quote: So we’re addressing that with the enterprise solutions we have and the Generative AI offerings.
FDS_2025Q2_2456.summary: The company is addressing needs with its enterprise solutions and Generative AI offerings.

FDS_2025Q4_2469.speaker: Helen Shan
FDS_2025Q4_2469.original_quote: We made meaningful progress against our multiyear AI road map, embedded FactSet deeper into client workflows by integrating LiquidityBook for seamless buy-side trading, and added Irwin to serve corporate IR needs, all while continuing to advance our open platform strategy.
FDS_2025Q4_2469.summary: The company is making meaningful progress on its multiyear AI roadmap by integrating LiquidityBook for buy-side trading and adding Irwin for corporate IR needs, while also advancing its open platform strategy.

FDS_2025Q4_2471.original_quote: Maybe I'll ask you, you mentioned that you think FactSet is well positioned to become the leading AI-powered financial intelligence platform.
FDS_2025Q4_2471.summary: FactSet is positioned to become the leading AI-powered financial intelligence platform.

FFIV_2023Q4_2414.speaker: Samik Chatterjee
FFIV_2023Q4_2414.original_quote: Additionally, could you discuss your expectations for AI demand and how it will impact both systems and the software in your portfolio?
FFIV_2023Q4_2414.summary: The company is being asked to discuss its expectations for AI demand and its impact on both systems and software in their portfolio.

FDS_2025Q4_2476.speaker: Sanoke Viswanathan

FDS_2025Q4_2475.summary: FactSet is discussing its AI strategy, focusing on improving internal efficiencies and enhancing client engagements.
FDS_2025Q4_2475.subcategory: AI Internal Efficiencies and Client Engagements

FDS_2025Q4_2474.speaker: Goran Skoko
FDS_2025Q4_2474.original_quote: We see that as a significant opportunity for AI and opportunities for AI solutions exist within the wealth management and we are taking advantage of some of them.
FDS_2025Q4_2474.summary: The company sees significant opportunities for AI solutions within wealth management and is taking advantage of some of these opportunities.

FDS_2025Q4_2468.speaker: Sanoke Viswanathan
FDS_2025Q4_2468.original_quote: AI and data-driven innovation are transforming how financial institutions operate, invest, and serve clients, which is driving increased demand for quality data.
FDS_2025Q4_2468.summary: FDS is recognizing that AI and data-driven innovation are changing the operations, investment strategies, and client services of financial institutions, leading to a higher demand for quality data.

FDS_2025Q2_2450.original_quote: I know, I want to start with a Gen AI question.

FDS_2025Q4_2479.original_quote: Sanoke, I want to welcome you and mention that although it's early, there has been significant investment in AI that appears to be very promising and integrated into many products, contributing to some growth.

KEYS_2025Q1_3267.summary: The company is planning to allocate additional funding towards initiatives such as 6G and quantum computing as the business begins to grow again.

KEYS_2025Q2_3276.summary: The company is servicing a portfolio of products that includes AI benchmarking tools as part of their offerings from early R&D to deployment.

MTCH_2023Q1_3454.original_quote: I have tasked our new CTO to work with our leadership team to evaluate emerging technologies like AI, which we believe can be a massive unlock for the category, the same way that the shift to mobile led to the creation of Tinder, which redefined the category just 10 years ago.
MTCH_2023Q1_3454.summary: The company is evaluating emerging technologies like AI, believing it can significantly enhance their category, similar to how the shift to mobile transformed their business with Tinder a decade ago.

MTCH_2023Q2_3458.speaker: Bernard Kim
MTCH_2023Q2_3458.original_quote: Grit has been evident in our team meetings, product roadmap execution, marketing, and budding AI efforts.
MTCH_2023Q2_3458.summary: The company is executing on its product roadmap and is beginning to implement AI efforts.

MTCH_2024Q2_3482.speaker: Gary Swidler
MTCH_2024Q2_3482.original_quote: At Tinder and Hinge where we see significant global growth opportunities, we want to put the right building blocks in place around marketing, product and tech, particularly around AI, given how game-changing we think it can be.
MTCH_2024Q2_3482.summary: MTCH is focusing on establishing foundational elements in marketing, product, and technology, particularly emphasizing the transformative potential of AI for Tinder and Hinge's global growth opportunities.

MTCH_2024Q1_3476.speaker: Bernard Kim
MTCH_2024Q1_3476.original_quote: Through innovation, especially with AI, we believe we can improve the quality of profiles, matching outcomes, safety features, and the post-match experience to make the entire Tinder platform more modern and deliver on our brand promise.
MTCH_2024Q1_3476.summary: The company is using AI to enhance the quality of profiles, improve matching outcomes, enhance safety features, and modernize the post-match experience on the Tinder platform.

MTCH_2024Q2_3483.speaker: Bernard Kim
MTCH_2024Q2_3483.original_quote: Examples of that are things that are in test and fully rolled out like Top Photo and Photo Finder, which utilize best-in-class AI.
MTCH_2024Q2_3483.summary: MTCH is utilizing best-in-class AI in features such as Top Photo and Photo Finder, which are currently in test and fully rolled out.

MTCH_2024Q3_3484.speaker: Bernard Kim
MTCH_2024Q3_3484.original_quote: We're embedding even more product innovations, like AI-enabled features, into every step of the user journey.
MTCH_2024Q3_3484.summary: The company is embedding AI-enabled features into every step of the user journey as part of their product innovations.

MTCH_2024Q4_3489.speaker: Steven Bailey
MTCH_2024Q4_3489.original_quote: We've also seen it with features like AI Photo finder, as an example.
MTCH_2024Q4_3489.summary: The company is implementing features such as AI Photo Finder.

MTCH_2024Q4_3488.speaker: Gary Swidler
MTCH_2024Q4_3488.original_quote: If I had to highlight one or two key initiatives, during our Investor Day we showcased an AI-driven matching feature designed to provide users with alternatives to swiping.
MTCH_2024Q4_3488.summary: The company is showcasing an AI-driven matching feature that offers users alternatives to swiping.

MCK_2023Q2_3491.speaker: Brian Tyler
MCK_2023Q2_3491.original_quote: We aim to enhance their value proposition by leveraging their technology, AI, and analytics to support our traditional McKesson programs.
MCK_2023Q2_3491.summary: McKesson aims to enhance their value proposition by leveraging technology, AI, and analytics to support their traditional programs.

MTCH_2024Q3_3485.speaker: Gary Swidler
MTCH_2024Q3_3485.original_quote: Hinge also continues to iterate on a variety of product advances including those that implement AI technologies to improve the user experience and outcomes.
MTCH_2024Q3_3485.summary: Hinge is iterating on product advances that implement AI technologies to enhance user experience and outcomes.

MTCH_2024Q4_3486.speaker: Gary Swidler
MTCH_2024Q4_3486.original_quote: At our Investor Day in December, we outlined our strategy to leverage innovation, especially driven by AI, to improve the product experience and reinvigorate growth.
MTCH_2024Q4_3486.summary: The company is outlining its strategy to leverage innovation driven by AI to enhance the product experience and stimulate growth.

MDT_2023Q1_3492.speaker: Geoff Martha
MDT_2023Q1_3492.original_quote: We won market share on the strength of our overall portfolio, including our unit AI-enabled surgical planning platform and patient-specific implants, which had strong double-digit sequential growth in our U.S.
MDT_2023Q1_3492.summary: Medtronic is experiencing strong double-digit sequential growth in their AI-enabled surgical planning platform and patient-specific implants, contributing to their overall portfolio and market share gains.

MDT_2023Q3_3493.speaker: Geoff Martha
MDT_2023Q3_3493.original_quote: From our AI-enabled surgical planning platform to our patient-specific and differentiated spine implants, to our imaging, navigation, and robotic technologies, we are differentiating ourselves with spine surgeons around the world.
MDT_2023Q3_3493.summary: Medtronic is utilizing an AI-enabled surgical planning platform along with patient-specific spine implants and advanced imaging, navigation, and robotic technologies to differentiate itself in the market for spine surgeons globally.

MTCH_2024Q4_3487.speaker: Spencer Rascoff
MTCH_2024Q4_3487.original_quote: And then in terms of timing, I believe that this Cambrian explosion in AI is going to allow Match Group to have the same kind of business inflection that the shift from desktop to mobile created for our category and other categories around 10 years ago when mobile exceeded desktop.
MTCH_2024Q4_3487.summary: Match Group believes that the current surge in AI will enable the company to experience a significant business transformation similar to the transition from desktop to mobile that occurred a decade ago.

MDT_2023Q3_3494.speaker: Geoff Martha
MDT_2023Q3_3494.original_quote: You’ve got the robot, navigation, interoperative imaging, power instruments, and now, you’ve got this AI-based surgical planning system that basically – we are winning over the hearts and minds of physicians as they see where we are going, and actually a real commitment to changing spine surgery wit
MDT_2023Q3_3494.summary: The company is introducing an AI-based surgical planning system that aims to enhance spine surgery, gaining support from physicians as they recognize the potential for change in the field.

MTCH_2023Q4_3472.speaker: Gary Swidler
MTCH_2023Q4_3472.original_quote: Gary mentioned in his comments that we are investing $20 million to $30 million in AI innovation.
MTCH_2023Q4_3472.summary: The company is investing $20 million to $30 million in AI innovation.

MTCH_2024Q4_3490.speaker: Spencer Rascoff
MTCH_2024Q4_3490.original_quote: We definitely plan to use AI across our brands in many different ways.
MTCH_2024Q4_3490.summary: The company plans to use AI across its brands in various ways.

MTCH_2023Q4_3475.speaker: Brad Erickson
MTCH_2023Q4_3475.original_quote: And it sounds like maybe AI could be having something to do with that.
MTCH_2023Q4_3475.summary: The quote suggests that AI might be influencing certain outcomes, but it does not specify how or in what capacity.

LRCX_2025Q3_3367.speaker: Tim Archer
LRCX_2025Q3_3367.original_quote: But, you know, I think, again, some of these things are in market dependent and we've talked in the past about the importance of getting the NAND technology up to a point where it can play a significant role in the AI data center and some of the enterprise SSD.
LRCX_2025Q3_3367.summary: The company is focusing on advancing NAND technology to enhance its role in AI data centers and enterprise SSDs.

MDT_2023Q4_3496.speaker: Geoffrey Martha
MDT_2023Q4_3496.original_quote: To start, we've noticed a trend over several years where the industry's value proposition focuses on enabling technology such as navigation, imaging, robotics, powered instruments, and AI-based surgical planning, all integrated into our ecosystem called Able.
MDT_2023Q4_3496.summary: The company is integrating AI-based surgical planning into its ecosystem called Able, alongside other enabling technologies like navigation, imaging, robotics, and powered instruments.

MDT_2023Q4_3495.speaker: Geoffrey Martha
MDT_2023Q4_3495.original_quote: Our GI business grew 16% on procedure volume recovery and continued strong adoption of GI Genius, another one of our AI-enabled products.
MDT_2023Q4_3495.summary: Medtronic's GI business experienced a 16% growth due to increased procedure volume and strong adoption of their AI-enabled product, GI Genius.

MDT_2023Q4_3497.speaker: Brett Wall
MDT_2023Q4_3497.original_quote: That ecosystem we've put together is taking the procedure and changing it with robotics, navigation, imaging, power surgical tools, AI surgical planning.
MDT_2023Q4_3497.summary: The company is integrating AI surgical planning into its ecosystem that includes robotics, navigation, imaging, and power surgical tools to enhance procedures.

MDT_2024Q1_3501.speaker: Chris Pasquale
MDT_2024Q1_3501.original_quote: You said Medtronic is investing heavily in artificial intelligence, a hot topic in the market.
MDT_2024Q1_3501.summary: Medtronic is investing heavily in artificial intelligence.

MDT_2024Q1_3498.speaker: Geoff Martha
MDT_2024Q1_3498.original_quote: And we're decisively allocating capital particularly to our programs and fast-growing markets, as well as focusing our R&D investments on technology megatrends like robotics and artificial intelligence that will drive growth in our industry over the next decade.
MDT_2024Q1_3498.summary: The company is focusing its R&D investments on technology megatrends such as robotics and artificial intelligence to drive growth in the industry over the next decade.

MTCH_2024Q1_3477.speaker: Daniel Salmon
MTCH_2024Q1_3477.original_quote: I'd like to talk AI a little bit and just first to ask about any of the early learnings you've seen from the tests of the AI photo selector on Tinder.
MTCH_2024Q1_3477.summary: The company is testing an AI photo selector feature on Tinder and is gathering early learnings from these tests.

MDT_2024Q1_3499.speaker: Geoff Martha
MDT_2024Q1_3499.original_quote: I anticipate sharing more details in upcoming quarters about how Ken will steer our initiatives involving technologies like robotics and AI throughout the company, which we believe will lead to new, differentiated therapies for patients and enhancing experiences for our customers.
MDT_2024Q1_3499.summary: The company anticipates sharing more details about initiatives involving AI and robotics, which they believe will lead to new therapies and enhance customer experiences.

MDT_2024Q1_3500.speaker: Matt Miksic
MDT_2024Q1_3500.original_quote: For my follow-up, Geoff mentioned something regarding the next-gen AID pump.
MDT_2024Q1_3500.summary: The company is mentioning the next-generation AID pump, which suggests a focus on advancements in their AI-driven medical devices.

MTCH_2024Q1_3479.speaker: Bernard Kim
MTCH_2024Q1_3479.original_quote: However, as I talked about earlier, AI photo selector will help make selecting photos easier, and we believe this will minimize the impact on MAU.
MTCH_2024Q1_3479.summary: The company is implementing an AI photo selector to simplify the process of selecting photos, which they believe will help reduce the impact on monthly active users (MAU).

MDT_2025Q3_3503.speaker: Geoff Martha
MDT_2025Q3_3503.original_quote: We're causing this disruption with our arsenal of differentiated enabling technology, including AI-driven preop planning software, imaging, robotics, navigation, and powered surgical instruments.
MDT_2025Q3_3503.summary: The company is utilizing AI-driven preoperative planning software as part of its differentiated enabling technology arsenal, which also includes imaging, robotics, navigation, and powered surgical instruments.

MDT_2024Q1_3502.speaker: Geoff Martha
MDT_2024Q1_3502.original_quote: Specifically, we have several AI-powered solutions approved by the FDA and other worldwide regulatory bodies, resulting in improved outcomes and access.
MDT_2024Q1_3502.summary: The company has several AI-powered solutions that have been approved by the FDA and other regulatory bodies, leading to improved outcomes and access.

META_2023Q1_3510.speaker: Susan Li
META_2023Q1_3510.original_quote: And as hiring resumes, you'll find the biggest areas that we are hiring in will be to support priority areas like generative AI, ads, infrastructure, Reality Labs, and some of the areas that we've been talking about.
META_2023Q1_3510.summary: META is resuming hiring, focusing on priority areas such as generative AI, among others.

META_2023Q1_3513.speaker: Mark Shmulik
META_2023Q1_3513.original_quote: In light of all of these technical integrations and AI tools because I think the prevailing view is that privacy will level the playing field, but it certainly doesn't seem that way.
META_2023Q1_3513.summary: The quote mentions technical integrations and AI tools being utilized, suggesting that the company is implementing AI in its operations. However, it also expresses a concern about privacy and its impact on competition.

META_2023Q1_3509.speaker: Mark Zuckerberg

META_2023Q1_3511.summary: The analyst expresses interest in Mark's comment regarding open source and open systems related to AI.

META_2023Q1_3507.speaker: Susan Li
META_2023Q1_3507.original_quote: We remain focused on continuing to improve ad ranking and measurement with our ongoing AI investments while also leveraging AI to power increased automation for advertisers through products like Advantage+ shopping, which continues to gain adoption and receive positive feedback from advertisers.
META_2023Q1_3507.summary: META is focused on improving ad ranking and measurement through ongoing AI investments and is leveraging AI to enhance automation for advertisers with products like Advantage+ shopping, which is gaining adoption and positive feedback.

META_2023Q1_3508.speaker: Brian Nowak
META_2023Q1_3508.original_quote: Mark, first one for you is on generative AI and how you think about generative AI and some of the division models and your large language models potentially impacting your long-term advertising business and finding ways to deliver more value for advertisers over the next two, three, five years?
META_2023Q1_3508.summary: The quote asks Mark about the impact of generative AI and large language models on Meta's long-term advertising business and how these technologies could enhance value for advertisers in the coming years.

META_2023Q1_3512.speaker: Susan Li
META_2023Q1_3512.original_quote: And the second part of your question was really, I think, about how AI might drive capital intensity over the next few years.
META_2023Q1_3512.summary: META is considering how AI might influence capital intensity in the coming years.

META_2023Q1_3514.speaker: Susan Li
META_2023Q1_3514.original_quote: This includes increasing the volume of ads aimed at on-site objectives and leveraging our AI investments, which have improved our ads' performance and allowed us to introduce new tools and features for advertisers.
META_2023Q1_3514.summary: META is leveraging its AI investments to improve ad performance and introduce new tools and features for advertisers.

META_2023Q1_3515.speaker: Doug Anmuth
META_2023Q1_3515.original_quote: And what gives you the confidence that it's durable and sustainable long-term even in a better macro environment, especially given all the work ahead on AI and the Metaverse?
META_2023Q1_3515.summary: The quote expresses a question about the company's confidence in the durability and sustainability of its efforts related to AI and the Metaverse in a better macro environment.

META_2023Q2_3521.speaker: Brian Nowak
META_2023Q2_3521.original_quote: Mark, you've spoken a few times over the last few months on AI agents and sort of building different types of assistants through Llama.
META_2023Q2_3521.summary: META is building different types of AI assistants through their Llama project.

META_2023Q1_3518.speaker: Susan Li
META_2023Q1_3518.original_quote: On Facebook, we are also observing that AI-driven recommendations are growing and fostering increased engagement on the app.
META_2023Q1_3518.summary: META is observing that AI-driven recommendations are increasing and enhancing user engagement on Facebook.

META_2023Q2_3520.speaker: Susan Li
META_2023Q2_3520.original_quote: Looking forward, we are optimistic about our ability to increase that value even further by leveraging advanced AI techniques to improve recommendations.
META_2023Q2_3520.summary: META is optimistic about increasing value by leveraging advanced AI techniques to improve recommendations.

LDOS_2025Q3_3393.speaker: Chris Cage
LDOS_2025Q3_3393.original_quote: Bottom line performance remains strong through consistent program execution, AI-driven cost efficiencies and overall prudent cost management.
LDOS_2025Q3_3393.summary: The company is achieving strong bottom line performance through AI-driven cost efficiencies and consistent program execution.

META_2023Q2_3519.speaker: Mark Zuckerberg
META_2023Q2_3519.original_quote: We've got continued progress on Threads, Reels, Llama 2 and some groundbreaking AI products in the pipeline, as well as the Quest 3 launch coming up this fall.
META_2023Q2_3519.summary: META is making continued progress on Threads, Reels, Llama 2, and has groundbreaking AI products in the pipeline.

META_2023Q2_3522.speaker: Mark Zuckerberg
META_2023Q2_3522.original_quote: But overall, I think there are three basic categories of our products or technologies that we're planning on building with generative AI.
META_2023Q2_3522.summary: META is planning to build products or technologies in three basic categories using generative AI.

META_2023Q2_3523.speaker: Mark Zuckerberg
META_2023Q2_3523.original_quote: What we've seen around open-source work that we've done, which we've done a lot of in our core infrastructure work, design of servers and data centers and basic infrastructure as well as in AI.
META_2023Q2_3523.summary: META has engaged in open-source work related to their core infrastructure, including the design of servers and data centers, as well as in AI.

META_2023Q2_3525.speaker: Mark Zuckerberg
META_2023Q2_3525.original_quote: But, for example, last year, I think we were getting quite a bit of critique for the volume of AI CapEx spending that we were doing and now, obviously, people want to understand where that's going and where we think that trajectory is going and want to make it as efficient as possible.
META_2023Q2_3525.summary: META is addressing critiques regarding their AI capital expenditures from last year and is now focused on making those investments as efficient as possible.

META_2023Q3_3533.speaker: Mark Shmulik
META_2023Q3_3533.original_quote: The first is, this month, you started to roll out some of those first kind of gen AI tools for ad creative.
META_2023Q3_3533.summary: META is rolling out generative AI tools for ad creative this month.

MDT_2025Q4_3505.original_quote: Our AI-enabled technology, branded AiBLE, supports this shift.

META_2023Q1_3506.speaker: Mark Zuckerberg
META_2023Q1_3506.original_quote: Now, more than 20% of content in your Facebook and Instagram feeds are recommended by AI from people groups or accounts that you don't follow.

MDT_2025Q4_3504.speaker: Geoff Martha
MDT_2025Q4_3504.original_quote: Our differentiated AiBLE spine ecosystem, including AI-driven preop planning software, imaging, robotics, navigation, and powered surgical instruments, has by far the largest installed base with over 10,000 capital units, well ahead of our competition.

META_2023Q2_3524.original_quote: Mark, things move quickly, like a month ago, we weren't talking about Reels, a quarter ago we were talking about Llama, and at the start of the year we were barely talking about AI.

META_2023Q2_3526.speaker: Susan Li
META_2023Q2_3526.original_quote: In terms of the question about Advantage+ specifically, Advantage+ is one of multiple AI-powered ad products that we have right now in the market.

META_2023Q3_3530.summary: META is recognized as a leader in developing unique open-source AI models.

META_2023Q3_3531.speaker: Mark Zuckerberg
META_2023Q3_3531.original_quote: I can start with the AI models.
META_2023Q3_3531.summary: The company is starting with the AI models.

META_2023Q3_3528.speaker: Mark Zuckerberg
META_2023Q3_3528.original_quote: Our AI tools for advertisers are also driving results with Advantage+ shopping campaigns, reaching a $10 billion run rate and more than half of our advertisers using our Advantage+ creative tools to optimize images and text in their ads creative.
META_2023Q3_3528.summary: META is providing AI tools for advertisers, specifically through Advantage+ shopping campaigns, which have reached a $10 billion run rate. More than half of their advertisers are utilizing Advantage+ creative tools to enhance their ad images and text.

META_2023Q3_3536.speaker: Mark Zuckerberg
META_2023Q3_3536.original_quote: I can share some insights about our recent AI launches.

META_2023Q3_3535.speaker: Doug Anmuth
META_2023Q3_3535.original_quote: Mark, I was hoping you could talk more about the gen AI-driven vertical chatbots and Meta AI assistant rolled out of Connect a few weeks ago.
META_2023Q3_3535.summary: Meta has rolled out generative AI-driven vertical chatbots and the Meta AI assistant as part of their offerings from Connect a few weeks ago.

META_2023Q3_3534.speaker: Susan Li
META_2023Q3_3534.original_quote: So your first question was around gen AI tools, especially for advertisers and you'll see that we have been increasingly testing these in our AI sandbox.
META_2023Q3_3534.summary: META is increasingly testing generative AI tools in their AI sandbox specifically for advertisers.

META_2023Q3_3529.speaker: Susan Li
META_2023Q3_3529.original_quote: We anticipate capital expenditures for 2024 to range from $30 billion to $35 billion, primarily driven by investments in servers, including both AI and non-AI hardware, as well as in data centers as we begin to ramp up construction for sites featuring the new data center architecture we introduced l
META_2023Q3_3529.summary: META anticipates capital expenditures for 2024 to be between $30 billion and $35 billion, driven mainly by investments in servers and data centers that include both AI and non-AI hardware.

META_2023Q3_3537.speaker: Susan Li
META_2023Q3_3537.original_quote: We're also rolling out numerous new features, both in generative AI and other areas of our ad tools, and refining the ranking and delivery models that support our advertising framework.
META_2023Q3_3537.summary: META is rolling out numerous new features in generative AI and refining the ranking and delivery models that support its advertising framework.

META_2023Q3_3538.speaker: Operator
META_2023Q3_3538.original_quote: Hey, Mark, just going back to the AI agent theme.
META_2023Q3_3538.summary: The company is referencing the theme of AI agents in their discussion.

META_2023Q3_3539.speaker: Mark Zuckerberg
META_2023Q3_3539.original_quote: While there might be some similarities to what OpenAI is doing with ChatGPT, our approach is distinct.
META_2023Q3_3539.summary: META is indicating that their approach to AI is distinct from what OpenAI is doing with ChatGPT, despite some similarities.

META_2023Q4_3546.speaker: Mark Shmulik
META_2023Q4_3546.original_quote: Mark, you mentioned at the top of the call this vision, kind of everyone having a Meta AI assistant to kind of get things done.
META_2023Q4_3546.summary: Meta is envisioning a future where everyone has a Meta AI assistant to help them accomplish tasks.

META_2023Q4_3550.speaker: Ronald Josey

META_2023Q4_3550.summary: The analyst is asking for elaboration on the development of AI Studio and any insights on its timing.

META_2023Q4_3542.speaker: Brian Nowak
META_2023Q4_3542.original_quote: Could you elaborate on the advertising business and discuss the new machine learning and GenAI ad tools that you've developed and launched over the past year?
META_2023Q4_3542.summary: META has developed and launched new machine learning and generative AI advertising tools over the past year.

META_2023Q4_3541.speaker: Susan Li
META_2023Q4_3541.original_quote: We are also making good progress in areas that have the potential to grow people's engagement with our products in the longer term, such as Threads and generative AI.
META_2023Q4_3541.summary: META is making good progress in generative AI, which has the potential to grow user engagement with their products over the long term.

META_2023Q4_3543.speaker: Susan Li
META_2023Q4_3543.original_quote: Finally, we are leveraging AI across our ads platform.
META_2023Q4_3543.summary: META is leveraging AI across its ads platform.

META_2023Q4_3545.speaker: Susan Li
META_2023Q4_3545.original_quote: So we're really continuing to evolve our AI road maps and ambitions and our understanding of the capacity demands that we might have as we train next generations of foundation models and to support all of the associated product development going forward.
META_2023Q4_3545.summary: META is evolving its AI road maps and ambitions while understanding the capacity demands for training next generations of foundation models to support future product development.

META_2023Q4_3547.speaker: Mark Zuckerberg
META_2023Q4_3547.original_quote: I believe that AI will enhance all of the products and services we use.
META_2023Q4_3547.summary: META believes that AI will enhance all of its products and services.

META_2023Q4_3552.speaker: Ross Sandler
META_2023Q4_3552.original_quote: Mark, just curious what you're seeing with Meta AI at this stage.
META_2023Q4_3552.summary: The analyst is inquiring about the current developments and observations regarding Meta AI.

META_2023Q4_3551.speaker: Susan Li
META_2023Q4_3551.original_quote: I was going to address the second question regarding the rollout of some GenAI features from a monetization perspective.
META_2023Q4_3551.summary: META is rolling out some GenAI features with a focus on monetization.

META_2023Q4_3549.speaker: Mark Zuckerberg
META_2023Q4_3549.original_quote: The main reason for moving FAIR is to foster closer collaboration with the GenAI group, as both are research teams.
META_2023Q4_3549.summary: META is moving the FAIR team to enhance collaboration with the GenAI group, as both teams focus on research.

META_2023Q2_3527.speaker: Susan Li
META_2023Q2_3527.original_quote: And then we certainly also expect to invest more in servers in 2024 for both AI workloads to support all of the AI work that we've talked about across the core AI ranking recommendation work along with the next-gen AI efforts.
META_2023Q2_3527.summary: META expects to invest more in servers in 2024 to support AI workloads related to core AI ranking recommendations and next-generation AI efforts.

META_2023Q4_3540.speaker: Mark Zuckerberg
META_2023Q4_3540.original_quote: 2023 was our year of efficiency, which focused on making Meta a stronger technology company and improving our business to give us the stability to deliver our ambitious long-term vision for AI and the metaverse.
META_2023Q4_3540.summary: Meta focused on improving its business efficiency to strengthen its technology capabilities, which will support its long-term vision for AI and the metaverse.

META_2024Q1_3554.speaker: Mark Zuckerberg

META_2023Q4_3544.speaker: Mark Zuckerberg
META_2023Q4_3544.original_quote: The primary goal is to provide stability so we can invest in our long-term, ambitious visions related to AI and the metaverse over the next decade.

META_2024Q1_3555.speaker: Susan Li
META_2024Q1_3555.original_quote: For the CapEx outlook, we foresee our full year 2024 capital expenditures to be between $35 billion and $40 billion, increased from our previous range of $30 billion to $37 billion as we accelerate investments in infrastructure to support our AI roadmap.
META_2024Q1_3555.summary: META is increasing its full year 2024 capital expenditures to support its AI roadmap, raising the forecast from a range of $30 billion to $37 billion to a new range of $35 billion to $40 billion.

META_2024Q1_3561.original_quote: Is the AI opportunity even larger, thus necessitating more investment than originally anticipated?
META_2024Q1_3561.summary: The quote raises the question of whether the AI opportunity is larger than previously thought, suggesting a need for increased investment in AI.

META_2024Q1_3562.speaker: Mark Zuckerberg
META_2024Q1_3562.original_quote: Yes, I'm increasingly optimistic and ambitious about AI.
META_2024Q1_3562.summary: The company is expressing increasing optimism and ambition regarding AI.

META_2024Q1_3563.speaker: Susan Li
META_2024Q1_3563.original_quote: That said, we believe we can continue cultivating engagement and growth across our products through investments in AI-based content recommendations and ongoing video initiatives.
META_2024Q1_3563.summary: META is investing in AI-based content recommendations to enhance engagement and growth across its products, along with ongoing video initiatives.

META_2024Q1_3564.summary: The analyst is inquiring about potential areas of convergence between AI and the Metaverse that could enable funding for AI initiatives through the Metaverse budget.

META_2024Q1_3565.speaker: Susan Li

META_2024Q1_3565.summary: META is categorizing its AI investments into core AI work and strategic bets, which includes generative AI and advanced research efforts.

MSFT_2023Q1_3618.summary: The company is transitioning to focus on data and AI.

PANW_2025Q3_4231.speaker: Nikesh Arora
PANW_2025Q3_4231.original_quote: If we consider the software firewall example, our discussions now begin with the necessity to secure AI implementations.

PANW_2025Q3_4237.speaker: Jonathan Ho

PANW_2025Q3_4237.summary: The quote inquires about how the AI opportunity may enhance the company's platform approach.

PANW_2025Q3_4240.original_quote: The rise of AI, especially in attacks, will likely change this landscape.

PANW_2025Q4_4243.original_quote: AI has already reduced the time needed to respond to attacks to 25 minutes.

PANW_2025Q4_4245.speaker: Lee Klarich
PANW_2025Q4_4245.original_quote: With the PAN-OS Orion launch from last week, we talked about cloud networking and building out a whole cloud networking fabric that connects into that, not only for cloud NGFWs, but also for our AI firewalls that run in the cloud as well.
PANW_2025Q4_4245.summary: PANW is launching the PAN-OS Orion, which includes cloud networking and a cloud networking fabric that integrates with their AI firewalls operating in the cloud.

PANW_2025Q3_4239.speaker: Joel Fishbein
PANW_2025Q3_4239.original_quote: I'm curious about how you view threat intelligence and the importance of sharing threat intelligence in this AI era and protecting against the bad guys.
PANW_2025Q3_4239.summary: The analyst is inquiring about the company's perspective on the role of threat intelligence sharing in the context of AI and its importance in defending against cyber threats.

PAYX_2024Q4_4253.speaker: David Togut
PAYX_2024Q4_4253.original_quote: Could you quantify the 2025 revenue or cost benefits from implementing Gen AI?
PAYX_2024Q4_4253.summary: The analyst is asking for quantification of the revenue or cost benefits expected in 2025 from implementing Generative AI.

PAYX_2024Q4_4249.speaker: John Gibson
PAYX_2024Q4_4249.original_quote: As you know, AI has been a hot topic in our industry and is something we have focused on for many years.
PAYX_2024Q4_4249.summary: PAYX has focused on AI for many years, recognizing it as a hot topic in the industry.

PAYX_2024Q4_4255.speaker: John Gibson
PAYX_2024Q4_4255.original_quote: Now I go back again, I guess, we pull ERTC without the models that we have from an AI perspective, ERTC would have been a very difficult and manual calculation that we would have had to do relative to the parameters.
PAYX_2024Q4_4255.summary: The company is using AI models to facilitate the calculation of the Employee Retention Tax Credit (ERTC), which would have been challenging and manual without these AI tools.

PAYX_2025Q1_4260.speaker: John Gibson
PAYX_2025Q1_4260.original_quote: And then with this new copilot product.
PAYX_2025Q1_4260.summary: PAYX is introducing a new copilot product.

PAYX_2025Q2_4264.original_quote: To what degree are some of the new AI field solutions that you are offering helping?
PAYX_2025Q2_4264.summary: The company is offering new AI field solutions.

PAYX_2025Q2_4265.speaker: John Gibson
PAYX_2025Q2_4265.original_quote: And maybe I will add on to the point that Mark made relative to the use of AI and how we are using AI.
PAYX_2025Q2_4265.summary: The company is using AI, as mentioned by the executive in relation to a point made by Mark.

PAYX_2025Q1_4259.speaker: John Gibson
PAYX_2025Q1_4259.original_quote: We are really excited about the copilot product.
PAYX_2025Q1_4259.summary: The company is excited about their copilot product.

PAYX_2025Q2_4263.speaker: Bob Schrader
PAYX_2025Q2_4263.original_quote: This is due to higher PEO direct-generated costs related to growth in our average worksite employees and PEO insurance revenues, as well as continued investments in product innovation, data, AI, and our go-to-market initiatives.
PAYX_2025Q2_4263.summary: The company is making continued investments in AI as part of their product innovation and go-to-market initiatives.

PAYX_2025Q2_4269.speaker: John Gibson
PAYX_2025Q2_4269.original_quote: We've enhanced our HR analytics through our Premium Plus product, now featuring GenAI insights, which includes 20 million employee records.
PAYX_2025Q2_4269.summary: PAYX has enhanced its HR analytics by incorporating GenAI insights into its Premium Plus product, utilizing data from 20 million employee records.

PAYX_2025Q1_4261.speaker: John Gibson
PAYX_2025Q1_4261.original_quote: I'll remind you on the copilot, you don't have to be an existing Paychex client to buy it today.
PAYX_2025Q1_4261.summary: Paychex is offering its copilot product for purchase to anyone, regardless of whether they are an existing client.

PAYX_2025Q3_4271.speaker: Bob Schrader
PAYX_2025Q3_4271.original_quote: Continued investments in product, technology, data, and AI were offset by productivity efficiency gains realized from these investments.
PAYX_2025Q3_4271.summary: PAYX is making continued investments in AI as part of their overall investments in product, technology, and data, which are contributing to productivity efficiency gains.

PAYX_2025Q4_4274.speaker: Robert Lewis Schrader
PAYX_2025Q4_4274.original_quote: We believe we are better positioned than ever before to win in the digital and AI-driven era of human capital management.
PAYX_2025Q4_4274.summary: The company believes it is better positioned than ever to succeed in the digital and AI-driven era of human capital management.

PAYX_2025Q2_4266.speaker: John Gibson
PAYX_2025Q2_4266.original_quote: I think that certainly, we continue to invest in the product, the new Paychex Flex Engage product, which is an AI-based engagement tool that allows our businesses to manage both performance and rewards and engagement with their employees and compensation more effectively.
PAYX_2025Q2_4266.summary: Paychex is investing in the new Paychex Flex Engage product, which is an AI-based engagement tool designed to help businesses manage employee performance, rewards, and engagement more effectively.

PAYC_2024Q3_4283.speaker: Chad Richison
PAYC_2024Q3_4283.original_quote: By utilizing our own AI agent, we were able to connect our clients to the right solution faster, improving our immediate response rates by 25% without any additional human interaction.
PAYC_2024Q3_4283.summary: PAYC is utilizing its own AI agent to connect clients to the appropriate solutions more quickly, resulting in a 25% improvement in immediate response rates without needing additional human interaction.

PAYX_2025Q3_4270.speaker: John Gibson
PAYX_2025Q3_4270.original_quote: As we enter the digital and AI-driven era of human capital management, we believe the combination of our positive underlying momentum and the pending acquisition of Paycor positions us well for continued success.
PAYX_2025Q3_4270.summary: PAYX believes that entering the digital and AI-driven era of human capital management, along with their acquisition of Paycor, positions them well for future success.

PAYC_2024Q2_4282.speaker: Craig Boelte
PAYC_2024Q2_4282.original_quote: We continue to aggressively invest in areas of AI, automation, international expansion, and our value proposition for the client.
PAYC_2024Q2_4282.summary: The company is aggressively investing in areas of AI, alongside automation, international expansion, and enhancing their value proposition for clients.

PAYC_2024Q2_4281.speaker: Chad Richison
PAYC_2024Q2_4281.original_quote: We continue to leverage AI across a wide variety of areas within our organization.
PAYC_2024Q2_4281.summary: The company is leveraging AI across various areas within its organization.

PAYC_2024Q4_4288.speaker: Chad Richison
PAYC_2024Q4_4288.original_quote: Paycom's AI agent, which was rolled out to our service team six months ago, utilizes our own knowledge-based semantic search model to provide faster responses and help our clients more quickly and consistently than ever before.
PAYC_2024Q4_4288.summary: Paycom's AI agent, launched six months ago, uses a knowledge-based semantic search model to enhance response speed and consistency for clients.

PAYC_2024Q3_4287.speaker: Chad Richison
PAYC_2024Q3_4287.original_quote: I would say this isn't the only area in which we're using AI.
PAYC_2024Q3_4287.summary: The company is using AI in multiple areas beyond the one mentioned.

PAYC_2024Q3_4284.speaker: Craig Boelte
PAYC_2024Q3_4284.original_quote: We expanded our investments in the area of AI, automation, and international expansion, resulting in a 20% increase in adjusted R&D expense to $55 million in the third quarter of 2024.
PAYC_2024Q3_4284.summary: The company expanded its investments in AI, automation, and international expansion, leading to a 20% increase in adjusted R&D expense to $55 million in Q3 2024.

PAYC_2024Q4_4289.speaker: Operator
PAYC_2024Q4_4289.original_quote: Are there certain areas where you're kind of being able to leverage AI or anything else to really provide a lot more productivity within your sales force?
PAYC_2024Q4_4289.summary: The company is leveraging AI to enhance productivity within its sales force.

PAYC_2024Q4_4290.speaker: Michael Funk
PAYC_2024Q4_4290.original_quote: How do you think about the longer-term evolution of pricing in the industry as automation becomes more part of the product, AI becomes more a part of the product.
PAYC_2024Q4_4290.summary: The company is considering the impact of automation and AI integration on pricing in the industry.

PAYC_2025Q3_4291.speaker: Chad Richison
PAYC_2025Q3_4291.original_quote: To facilitate the automation experience, including IWant and future AI developments in the pipeline, we significantly expanded our data center capabilities, spending roughly $100 million of AI-focused CapEx on our Phoenix and Oklahoma City data centers.
PAYC_2025Q3_4291.summary: PAYC significantly expanded its data center capabilities by spending approximately $100 million on AI-focused capital expenditures to facilitate automation experiences, including IWant and future AI developments.

PAYC_2024Q1_4280.speaker: Chad Richison
PAYC_2024Q1_4280.original_quote: It takes some trust because you are giving up some level of control when you turn it over to AI, and you have to prove that out.
PAYC_2024Q1_4280.summary: The company acknowledges that using AI requires a level of trust as it involves relinquishing some control, and emphasizes the need to demonstrate the reliability of AI systems.

PAYC_2025Q3_4296.speaker: Unknown Analyst

PYPL_2023Q1_4303.speaker: Daniel Schulman

PYPL_2023Q1_4304.speaker: Daniel Schulman

PYPL_2025Q2_4317.speaker: Alex Chriss

PYPL_2025Q4_4326.summary: The company is using AI to improve processes and optimize their cost base, allowing them to redirect spending towards innovation.

PNR_2025Q3_4327.speaker: John Stauch

PPL_2024Q1_4348.speaker: Vincent Sorgi

PRU_2023Q3_4359.speaker: Charles Lowrey

PRU_2024Q2_4360.speaker: Charlie Lowrey

PWR_2023Q4_4368.original_quote: The advancements in technology, particularly with AI and data centers, are significant drivers.

PWR_2024Q1_4374.summary: The company had a solid business prior to the arrival of AI, focusing on trends such as fuel switching, electric vehicle adoption, and a shift towards renewables.

QCOM_2023Q2_4376.speaker: Cristiano Amon
QCOM_2023Q2_4376.original_quote: Our next-generation Snapdragon Compute platform, with custom Orion CPUs and industry-leading AI acceleration, is on schedule to enable commercial device launches in 2024.
QCOM_2023Q2_4376.summary: QCOM is developing its next-generation Snapdragon Compute platform, which includes custom Orion CPUs and advanced AI acceleration, set to launch commercially in 2024.

QCOM_2023Q2_4377.speaker: Akash Palkhiwala
QCOM_2023Q2_4377.original_quote: Cristiano mentioned Edge AI, which will be crucial in Industrial, PC, XR, and other sectors.
QCOM_2023Q2_4377.summary: QCOM is focusing on Edge AI, highlighting its importance in various sectors including Industrial, PC, and XR.

QCOM_2023Q2_4379.speaker: Akash Palkhiwala
QCOM_2023Q2_4379.original_quote: And then with the AI that Cristiano just outlined, that will create an opportunity for us as well.
QCOM_2023Q2_4379.summary: QCOM is identifying opportunities created by the AI initiatives outlined by Cristiano.

QCOM_2023Q3_4382.speaker: Akash Palkhiwala
QCOM_2023Q3_4382.original_quote: In closing, we remain focused on executing on our vision to bring connectivity, high-performance, low-power computing, and on-device generative AI to the edge.
QCOM_2023Q3_4382.summary: QCOM is focused on executing its vision to bring on-device generative AI to the edge, alongside connectivity and high-performance computing.

QCOM_2023Q2_4380.speaker: Cristiano Amon
QCOM_2023Q2_4380.original_quote: The last comment is we are going to become very relevant in AI.
QCOM_2023Q2_4380.summary: The company is stating that it will become very relevant in AI.

QCOM_2023Q3_4383.speaker: Stacy Rasgon
QCOM_2023Q3_4383.original_quote: Cristiano, you're talking a lot about AI and how that's going to contribute.
QCOM_2023Q3_4383.summary: The speaker notes that Cristiano is discussing AI and its expected contributions.

QCOM_2023Q3_4381.speaker: Cristiano Amon
QCOM_2023Q3_4381.original_quote: Our fastest Snapdragon ever for Samsung defines a new standard in smartphone computing capabilities AI experiences, desktop-level gaming features, professional-grade photography, enhanced mobile productivity, and more.
QCOM_2023Q3_4381.summary: Qualcomm is introducing its fastest Snapdragon processor for Samsung, which sets a new standard in smartphone computing capabilities with AI experiences, desktop-level gaming features, and professional-grade photography.

QCOM_2023Q3_4387.speaker: Cristiano Amon
QCOM_2023Q3_4387.original_quote: I also want to highlight that we see a new inflection point on the edge with Gen AI.
QCOM_2023Q3_4387.summary: The company sees a new inflection point on the edge with Generative AI.

QCOM_2023Q4_4388.speaker: Cristiano Amon
QCOM_2023Q4_4388.original_quote: For example, in the latest Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 smartphone platform, state-of-the-art large language models, such as Llama and Vicuna with up to 10 billion parameters are running at up to 20 tokens per second.
QCOM_2023Q4_4388.summary: QCOM is integrating state-of-the-art large language models, like Llama and Vicuna, into the Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 smartphone platform, achieving performance of up to 20 tokens per second.

QCOM_2023Q4_4393.speaker: Cristiano Amon
QCOM_2023Q4_4393.original_quote: But not only that, I think it's important to highlight the AI processing capability because that's key to answer your question.
QCOM_2023Q4_4393.summary: QCOM is highlighting the importance of its AI processing capability as a key element in addressing inquiries.

QCOM_2023Q4_4396.speaker: Akash Palkhiwala
QCOM_2023Q4_4396.original_quote: Well, and maybe just the other thing to keep in mind is outside handsets, as we talk about the PC opportunity, of course, our AI leadership becomes extremely important there.
QCOM_2023Q4_4396.summary: QCOM emphasizes the importance of their AI leadership in relation to the PC opportunity outside of handsets.

QCOM_2023Q4_4392.speaker: Cristiano Amon
QCOM_2023Q4_4392.original_quote: I think as I said, we probably have one of the best product roadmaps in the history of the company, especially in the Gen AI processing capabilities.
QCOM_2023Q4_4392.summary: The company is highlighting its strong product roadmap, particularly in generative AI processing capabilities.

QCOM_2023Q3_4385.speaker: Akash Palkhiwala
QCOM_2023Q3_4385.original_quote: Our approach is to maintain our strategic priorities, make reductions in certain areas, and still have the flexibility to invest in new technologies, particularly in AI, while also continuing our diversification efforts.
QCOM_2023Q3_4385.summary: The company is maintaining its strategic priorities and flexibility to invest in new technologies, particularly in AI, while also pursuing diversification efforts.

QCOM_2023Q4_4397.speaker: Ross Seymore
QCOM_2023Q4_4397.original_quote: Cristiano, you talked about AI at the edge and across a number of different products, whether it’s the PC side, the handset side, etcetera.
QCOM_2023Q4_4397.summary: The company is discussing AI applications at the edge across various products, including PCs and handsets.

QCOM_2025Q3_4402.speaker: Cristiano Amon
QCOM_2025Q3_4402.original_quote: The other one is the head unit for inferencing clusters as AI starts to get scale, and we really look at how we're starting to see inference taking over training.
QCOM_2025Q3_4402.summary: The company is focusing on developing head units for inferencing clusters as AI scales, noting that inference is beginning to surpass training in importance.

QCOM_2025Q3_4403.summary: The quote asks for more details about the use of Gemini and Galaxy AI in Android.

QCOM_2023Q4_4398.speaker: Akash Palkhiwala
QCOM_2023Q4_4398.original_quote: From an ASP perspective, because of all the factors we discussed earlier in the call with the chips becoming way more capable, especially with GenAI, we think we are on a good trajectory to continue to expand our ASP consistent with the last three-year trend.
QCOM_2023Q4_4398.summary: QCOM is seeing an increase in average selling prices (ASP) due to the enhanced capabilities of their chips, particularly with the integration of Generative AI (GenAI). They believe this trend will continue based on their previous three-year performance.

QCOM_2025Q3_4400.speaker: Cristiano Amon
QCOM_2025Q3_4400.original_quote: For example, Samsung noted that 70% of Galaxy S25 users are utilizing Galaxy AI and usage of Google Gemini AI has nearly tripled among S25 users compared to the S24.
QCOM_2025Q3_4400.summary: Samsung reported that 70% of Galaxy S25 users are using Galaxy AI, and the usage of Google Gemini AI has nearly tripled among S25 users compared to the previous model, the S24.

QCOM_2025Q4_4408.speaker: Cristiano Amon
QCOM_2025Q4_4408.original_quote: That is both for the head node of AI clusters as well as general-purpose compute.
QCOM_2025Q4_4408.summary: The company is providing solutions for both the head node of AI clusters and general-purpose computing.

QCOM_2023Q3_4384.speaker: Cristiano Amon
QCOM_2023Q3_4384.original_quote: On-device, I think there's a number of reasons AI is developing on devices, a little bit different in the cloud.
QCOM_2023Q3_4384.summary: QCOM is observing that AI is developing on devices for various reasons, which differs from cloud-based AI development.

QCOM_2025Q4_4409.speaker: Samik Chatterjee
QCOM_2025Q4_4409.original_quote: Can you provide clarity on your thoughts about deployment costs on a gigawatt basis, particularly in relation to the price performance associated with these inference workloads that the AI 200 or AI 250 can handle?
QCOM_2025Q4_4409.summary: The analyst is asking for clarity on the deployment costs on a gigawatt basis, specifically regarding the price performance of inference workloads that the AI 200 or AI 250 can manage.

QCOM_2025Q4_4410.speaker: Cristiano Amon

QCOM_2023Q3_4386.speaker: Akash Palkhiwala

QCOM_2023Q3_4386.summary: QCOM is focusing on generative AI as it becomes essential in edge devices, which will enhance their presence and ability to expand content in that area.

QCOM_2023Q4_4390.summary: The quote mentions that on-device AI is expected to become pervasive in a few years, and investors are seeking evidence that it will be a key focus area for many OEMs in smartphones and other devices.

QCOM_2025Q4_4412.speaker: Akash Palkhiwala
