RCL_2024Q3_4513.summary: The company has been focused on deploying AI tools and other technologies to utilize information effectively for decision-making.

RCL_2024Q4_4515.speaker: Jason Liberty
RCL_2024Q4_4515.original_quote: Additionally, our use of technology is improving, particularly with AI and GenAI, enhancing the guest experience and helping us make better recommendations on pricing and guest services.
RCL_2024Q4_4515.summary: RCL is using AI and GenAI to enhance the guest experience and improve recommendations on pricing and guest services.

RCL_2025Q1_4516.speaker: Jason Liberty
RCL_2025Q1_4516.original_quote: Our investments in technology, such as the yield management program, now featuring a considerable amount of AI, continue to evolve.
RCL_2025Q1_4516.summary: RCL is investing in technology, specifically a yield management program that incorporates a significant amount of AI.

SPGI_2024Q1_4519.speaker: Douglas Peterson
SPGI_2024Q1_4519.original_quote: We're also pleased to see early results from the enterprise AI initiatives we outlined for you last quarter.
SPGI_2024Q1_4519.summary: The company is seeing early results from the enterprise AI initiatives they previously outlined.

ROST_2023Q4_4511.speaker: Michael Hartshorn
ROST_2023Q4_4511.original_quote: We're looking at leveraging AI in two parts.
ROST_2023Q4_4511.summary: The company is looking at leveraging AI in two parts.

SPGI_2024Q2_4523.speaker: Doug Peterson
SPGI_2024Q2_4523.original_quote: We continue to accelerate our deployment of generative AI and launch new capabilities both at the division and enterprise level.
SPGI_2024Q2_4523.summary: The company is accelerating its deployment of generative AI and launching new capabilities at both the division and enterprise levels.

SPGI_2024Q2_4529.speaker: Douglas Peterson
SPGI_2024Q2_4529.original_quote: We've got incredible, really good initiatives that we're developing and delivering in energy transition, sustainability with private markets, with generative AI.
SPGI_2024Q2_4529.summary: The company is developing and delivering initiatives in energy transition and sustainability that incorporate generative AI.

SPGI_2024Q3_4531.speaker: Martina Cheung
SPGI_2024Q3_4531.original_quote: With our executive leadership team in place, we are in a strong position to execute against well-defined strategic initiatives, benchmarks, private markets, sustainability and energy transition, enterprise data, and Generative AI were all topics that we discussed at our Investor Day in 2022, and we
SPGI_2024Q3_4531.summary: The company is in a strong position to execute on strategic initiatives that include Generative AI, which was discussed at their Investor Day in 2022.

SPGI_2024Q1_4520.speaker: Craig Huber
SPGI_2024Q1_4520.original_quote: On your AI investments, obviously, you're doing that to enhance the products you have but also improve the ongoing efficiency of the company, which is already at a high level and stuff.
SPGI_2024Q1_4520.summary: SPGI is investing in AI to enhance its existing products and improve the company's operational efficiency, which is already high.

SPGI_2024Q3_4533.speaker: Jason Haas
SPGI_2024Q3_4533.original_quote: Curious if you could talk about what you're seeing in terms of the pace of AI adoption among your customers.
SPGI_2024Q3_4533.summary: The analyst is inquiring about the pace of AI adoption among SPGI's customers.

SPGI_2024Q2_4525.speaker: Toni Kaplan
SPGI_2024Q2_4525.original_quote: I wanted to ask about AI.
SPGI_2024Q2_4525.summary: The analyst is inquiring about AI.

SPGI_2024Q2_4527.speaker: Martina Cheung
SPGI_2024Q2_4527.original_quote: We're very excited overall about the potential for GenAI to improve quality, to create efficiency and time to market for our core Ratings business.
SPGI_2024Q2_4527.summary: The company is excited about the potential of GenAI to enhance quality and create efficiency, as well as reduce time to market for their core Ratings business.

SPGI_2025Q1_4544.speaker: Eric Abwaf
SPGI_2025Q1_4544.original_quote: In other areas like commodity insights, we've had a real push on using Gen AI for productivity and some of the analytical and research functions.
SPGI_2025Q1_4544.summary: SPGI is using Generative AI to enhance productivity in commodity insights and improve analytical and research functions.

CRM_2024Q1_4546.speaker: Brian Millham
CRM_2024Q1_4546.original_quote: As you heard from Marc, our transformation plan continues to deliver top and bottom-line growth as we help our customers increase productivity, drive efficiency, and become AI-first companies.
CRM_2024Q1_4546.summary: The company is helping its customers increase productivity and drive efficiency as they transition to becoming AI-first companies.

CRM_2024Q1_4547.speaker: Amy Weaver
CRM_2024Q1_4547.original_quote: We are hyper-focused on delivering the next wave of innovation led by Data Cloud and Einstein GPT, and Salesforce is well-positioned to remain the market leader in this new AI-first world.
CRM_2024Q1_4547.summary: Salesforce is focused on delivering innovation through Data Cloud and Einstein GPT, positioning itself as a market leader in an AI-first environment.

CRM_2024Q1_4549.speaker: Marc Benioff
CRM_2024Q1_4549.original_quote: Today, ChatGPT is the fastest-growing consumer product of all time and has transformed many lives.
CRM_2024Q1_4549.summary: The company acknowledges that ChatGPT is the fastest-growing consumer product and has had a significant impact on many lives.

SPGI_2024Q4_4541.speaker: Peter Christiansen
SPGI_2024Q4_4541.original_quote: Could you discuss how elements of the Vitality Index or possible AI products could contribute to synergy realization and if this could provide an uplift to overall benefits?
SPGI_2024Q4_4541.summary: The quote asks about the potential contributions of the Vitality Index and possible AI products to synergy realization and overall benefits.

CRM_2024Q1_4550.speaker: Brian Millham
CRM_2024Q1_4550.original_quote: As Marc just talked about, this new AI wave is going to create a huge opportunity for us.
CRM_2024Q1_4550.summary: The company is acknowledging that the new AI wave presents a significant opportunity for them.

CRM_2024Q1_4548.speaker: Kirk Materne
CRM_2024Q1_4548.original_quote: I was just curious where you think we are in terms of people investigating AI versus when the spending cycle around it might kick in?
CRM_2024Q1_4548.summary: The analyst is inquiring about the current level of interest in AI and when the associated spending cycle might begin.

CRM_2024Q1_4545.speaker: Marc Benioff
CRM_2024Q1_4545.original_quote: Last quarter, I told you about how our AI team is getting ready to launch Einstein GPT, the world's first generative AI for CRM.
CRM_2024Q1_4545.summary: The company is preparing to launch Einstein GPT, which is described as the world's first generative AI specifically for CRM.

CRM_2024Q1_4555.speaker: Marc Benioff
CRM_2024Q1_4555.original_quote: In January, you published a paper in nature from your research team called large language models, generating functional protein sequences across diverse families—and you really showed something amazing, which was that deep learning language models have shown this incredible promise in various biotec
CRM_2024Q1_4555.summary: The company published a paper demonstrating that deep learning language models can generate functional protein sequences across diverse families, showcasing their potential in biotechnology.

CRM_2024Q1_4560.speaker: Kash Rangan
CRM_2024Q1_4560.original_quote: Can you just parse for us, if you don't mind, what is new about generative AI as far as Salesforce opportunities are concerned, netting out against what Einstein has been able to accomplish for the company?
CRM_2024Q1_4560.summary: The analyst is asking Salesforce to clarify the new opportunities presented by generative AI in comparison to the capabilities already achieved with Einstein, Salesforce's existing AI solution.

CRM_2024Q1_4561.speaker: Marc Benioff
CRM_2024Q1_4561.original_quote: Well, thanks, Kash, for the opportunity to talk about our AI vision, and I'm also going to ask Srini to fill in some details.
CRM_2024Q1_4561.summary: The company is discussing its AI vision and plans, with an executive indicating that another team member will provide additional details.

CRM_2024Q1_4554.speaker: Srini Tallapragada
CRM_2024Q1_4554.original_quote: Everyone is interested in generative AI, and while everybody understands the use cases, they're really worried about trust.
CRM_2024Q1_4554.summary: The company acknowledges that there is widespread interest in generative AI and recognizes that while use cases are understood, there are significant concerns regarding trust.

CRM_2024Q2_4566.speaker: Amy Weaver
CRM_2024Q2_4566.original_quote: As you can see in our results, we're progressing towards driving profitable growth and shareholder value, and we are well positioned for the future as the number one AI CRM.
CRM_2024Q2_4566.summary: The company is progressing towards profitable growth and shareholder value while positioning itself as the number one AI CRM.

CRM_2024Q2_4565.speaker: Brian Millham
CRM_2024Q2_4565.original_quote: They all see AI CRM as the answer to those priorities, and we're making it easier and faster for our customers to unleash the power of trusted generative AI safely and at scale.
CRM_2024Q2_4565.summary: The company is making it easier and faster for customers to utilize trusted generative AI within their CRM solutions at scale.

CRM_2024Q2_4567.speaker: Marc Benioff
CRM_2024Q2_4567.original_quote: AI is about to ignite a buying revolution.
CRM_2024Q2_4567.summary: The company states that AI is poised to trigger a significant buying revolution.

CRM_2024Q1_4553.speaker: Marc Benioff
CRM_2024Q1_4553.original_quote: Well, I think that when you look at our artificial intelligence strategy, which we're discussing with the largest, most important companies and governments in the world, it has to be architected around security, compliance, trust, and governance.
CRM_2024Q1_4553.summary: The company is discussing its artificial intelligence strategy with major companies and governments, emphasizing that it must be designed with a focus on security, compliance, trust, and governance.

CRM_2024Q1_4557.speaker: Marc Benioff
CRM_2024Q1_4557.original_quote: You developed specific grounding techniques that will keep our customers' data safe and not be consumed by these voracious large language models, which are very hungry for all of our customers' data.
CRM_2024Q1_4557.summary: The company has developed specific grounding techniques to ensure that customer data remains safe and is not consumed by large language models that require extensive data access.

CRM_2024Q1_4562.speaker: Srini Tallapragada
CRM_2024Q1_4562.original_quote: The initial version of generative AI will support assistance while remaining grounded and human-in-the-loop.
CRM_2024Q1_4562.summary: The company is developing an initial version of generative AI that will provide assistance while ensuring human oversight is maintained.

CRM_2024Q2_4564.speaker: Marc Benioff
CRM_2024Q2_4564.original_quote: We're also adding a fifth priority: driving our AI transformation.
CRM_2024Q2_4564.summary: The company is adding a fifth priority focused on driving its AI transformation.

CRM_2024Q2_4573.speaker: Brad Sills
CRM_2024Q2_4573.original_quote: I want to ask about the impact of AI across Salesforce.
CRM_2024Q2_4573.summary: The analyst is inquiring about the effects of AI on Salesforce's operations and offerings.

CRM_2024Q3_4577.speaker: Amy Weaver
CRM_2024Q3_4577.original_quote: And we are pioneering the next wave of innovation with data, AI, CRM, and trust.
CRM_2024Q3_4577.summary: The company is pioneering innovation by integrating data, AI, CRM, and trust into their offerings.

CRM_2024Q2_4574.speaker: Marc Benioff
CRM_2024Q2_4574.original_quote: We're at the beginning of an AI evolution across four major zones.
CRM_2024Q2_4574.summary: The company is initiating an AI evolution that encompasses four major areas.

CRM_2024Q3_4578.speaker: Kirk Materne
CRM_2024Q3_4578.original_quote: Additionally, is the interest in MuleSoft indicative of a growing interest in AI as people work to organize their data in preparation for the upcoming AI wave?
CRM_2024Q3_4578.summary: The quote suggests that interest in MuleSoft may reflect a growing interest in AI as organizations prepare their data for the anticipated AI wave.

CRM_2024Q3_4581.speaker: Amy Weaver
CRM_2024Q3_4581.original_quote: Right now, I really see areas of investment in AI and Data Cloud.
CRM_2024Q3_4581.summary: The company is currently focusing on investments in AI and Data Cloud.

CRM_2024Q3_4575.speaker: Marc Benioff
CRM_2024Q3_4575.original_quote: With Einstein now performing 1 trillion transactions weekly and 17% of the Fortune 100 utilizing our Copilot, the excitement around this product is palpable.
CRM_2024Q3_4575.summary: Salesforce's Einstein is currently executing 1 trillion transactions each week, and 17% of the Fortune 100 companies are using their Copilot product.

CRM_2024Q3_4587.speaker: Marc Benioff
CRM_2024Q3_4587.original_quote: Users will have the option to utilize our AI models or integrate their own, which is an impressive feature.
CRM_2024Q3_4587.summary: Users will have the option to utilize the company's AI models or integrate their own, which is highlighted as an impressive feature.

CRM_2024Q4_4588.speaker: Marc Benioff
CRM_2024Q4_4588.original_quote: The industry has also gone through significant changes with the rise of the next generation of artificial intelligence.
CRM_2024Q4_4588.summary: The company acknowledges that the industry has experienced significant changes due to the rise of the next generation of artificial intelligence.

CRM_2024Q3_4576.speaker: Brian Millham
CRM_2024Q3_4576.original_quote: As the number one AI CRM, companies in every industry and geography like Fujitsu, Southwest Airlines, and NZ Bank are turning to us as their trusted adviser to help them transform their business for the AI future.
CRM_2024Q3_4576.summary: CRM is recognized as the number one AI CRM, with companies like Fujitsu, Southwest Airlines, and NZ Bank relying on them as a trusted adviser for business transformation in the AI future.

CRM_2024Q4_4591.speaker: Marc Benioff
CRM_2024Q4_4591.original_quote: If you see anyone else delivering enterprise AI at the same quality, scale, and capability as Salesforce, I would be surprised.
CRM_2024Q4_4591.summary: Salesforce claims to deliver enterprise AI with unmatched quality, scale, and capability compared to competitors.

CRM_2024Q4_4592.speaker: Brian Millham
CRM_2024Q4_4592.original_quote: We are seeing tremendous demand for Data Cloud and AI.
CRM_2024Q4_4592.summary: The company is experiencing significant demand for its Data Cloud and AI offerings.

CRM_2024Q4_4589.speaker: Brian Millham
CRM_2024Q4_4589.original_quote: With AI and Data Cloud integrated, we are enthusiastic about the momentum of our UE Plus Bundle, now known as Einstein 1 Edition.
CRM_2024Q4_4589.summary: The company is integrating AI and Data Cloud into their UE Plus Bundle, which is now called Einstein 1 Edition, and they are enthusiastic about its momentum.

CRM_2024Q4_4590.speaker: Amy Weaver
CRM_2024Q4_4590.original_quote: And for fiscal year '25, we expect a non-GAAP operating margin of 32.5% representing a 200 basis point improvement year-over-year, while still making key investments in growth opportunities, notably AI, data and our core businesses.
CRM_2024Q4_4590.summary: The company expects to make key investments in AI for fiscal year '25 while also improving its non-GAAP operating margin by 200 basis points year-over-year.

CRM_2024Q4_4594.speaker: Keith Weiss
CRM_2024Q4_4594.original_quote: A question just on sort of buying cycles and sort of the timing for this AI goodness to kind of come into the numbers.
CRM_2024Q4_4594.summary: The analyst is inquiring about the timing for AI benefits to start reflecting in the company's financial results.

CRM_2024Q4_4595.speaker: Brian Millham
CRM_2024Q4_4595.original_quote: Our customers have a strong desire to leverage AI capabilities to enhance efficiency, increase margins, and boost productivity.
CRM_2024Q4_4595.summary: The company is acknowledging that its customers want to utilize AI capabilities to improve efficiency, increase margins, and enhance productivity.

CRM_2024Q3_4585.speaker: Brian Millham
CRM_2024Q3_4585.original_quote: Exactly what I was going to say, a lot of demand at the top of the funnel for us for new technologies like Data Cloud and like AI, but also seeing some headwinds, no doubt, from our more transactional business, as you stated.
CRM_2024Q3_4585.summary: The company is experiencing significant demand for new technologies, including AI, at the top of the sales funnel, while also facing challenges in its transactional business.

CRM_2024Q4_4601.speaker: Marc Benioff
CRM_2024Q4_4601.original_quote: At the end of the day, we know AI is advancing rapidly.
CRM_2024Q4_4601.summary: The company acknowledges that AI is advancing rapidly.

CRM_2024Q4_4602.speaker: Marc Benioff
CRM_2024Q4_4602.original_quote: This is AI revolution, it's a data revolution.
CRM_2024Q4_4602.summary: The company is stating that the current changes are part of an AI revolution that is fundamentally tied to a data revolution.

CRM_2025Q1_4605.speaker: Marc Benioff
CRM_2025Q1_4605.original_quote: First is our incredible financial transformation as you can see from the numbers today and the second is the incredible work that's happening with artificial intelligence.
CRM_2025Q1_4605.summary: The company is highlighting the significant financial transformation alongside the impressive work being done with artificial intelligence.

CRM_2024Q4_4604.speaker: Brian Millham
CRM_2024Q4_4604.original_quote: We want to be able to deliver Data Cloud and AI at all levels, in all segments.
CRM_2024Q4_4604.summary: The company aims to deliver Data Cloud and AI across all levels and segments.

CRM_2025Q1_4606.speaker: Brian Millham
CRM_2025Q1_4606.original_quote: As Marc said, we're incredibly well positioned for this AI transformation.
CRM_2025Q1_4606.summary: The company states that it is incredibly well positioned for the AI transformation.

CRM_2025Q1_4608.speaker: Marc Benioff
CRM_2025Q1_4608.original_quote: The AI transformation is fundamentally changing how we engage with software, as well as the algorithms and data models that underpin AI.
CRM_2025Q1_4608.summary: The company is acknowledging that the AI transformation is fundamentally changing engagement with software, along with the algorithms and data models that support AI.

CRM_2025Q1_4607.speaker: Amy Weaver
CRM_2025Q1_4607.original_quote: Our new offerings for small and medium businesses, Starter and Pro Suite, which are ready-to-use simplified solutions with AI built in, are building momentum.
CRM_2025Q1_4607.summary: The company is offering new solutions for small and medium businesses, specifically the Starter and Pro Suite, which include built-in AI features and are gaining traction in the market.

CRM_2024Q4_4596.speaker: Amy Weaver
CRM_2024Q4_4596.original_quote: Some of the GenAI, it's still early, and given that the adoption curve at really our size and scale as a $38 billion company, we're not factoring in a material contribution from these new products into our FY25 revenue guidance at this time.
CRM_2024Q4_4596.summary: The company acknowledges that it is still early in the adoption of Generative AI and is not including a significant contribution from these new products in its FY25 revenue guidance.

CRM_2025Q1_4611.speaker: Brian Millham
CRM_2025Q1_4611.original_quote: Marc mentioned earlier that 75% of the benefits of Gen AI will come from the front office, and we're currently experiencing that in the demand from our customers and the pipelines we're establishing.
CRM_2025Q1_4611.summary: The company is experiencing demand from customers and establishing pipelines related to the benefits of Generative AI, which Marc noted will primarily come from the front office.

CRM_2025Q1_4614.speaker: Kash Rangan
CRM_2025Q1_4614.original_quote: And how confident are you that this generative AI, which is causing an upheaval in that whole tech stack is not something to take lightly?
CRM_2025Q1_4614.summary: The quote expresses concern about the significant impact of generative AI on the technology stack, indicating that it should not be underestimated.

CRM_2025Q1_4615.speaker: Marc Benioff
CRM_2025Q1_4615.original_quote: First, using OpenAI over the past year has been remarkable, especially with the latest release where I can really interact with it.
CRM_2025Q1_4615.summary: The company is using OpenAI and has found the experience remarkable, particularly with the latest release that allows for better interaction.

CRM_2025Q1_4613.speaker: Marc Benioff
CRM_2025Q1_4613.original_quote: Many newcomers to our industry over the last five to ten years require substantial training and skill development, especially as we embrace new technologies like artificial intelligence, Generative AI, and data capabilities.
CRM_2025Q1_4613.summary: The company is embracing new technologies such as artificial intelligence, Generative AI, and data capabilities, which require substantial training and skill development for newcomers to the industry.

CRM_2025Q1_4609.speaker: Kirk Materne
CRM_2025Q1_4609.original_quote: But I was just kind of curious, when we think about this measured buying environment, is there any sort of crowding effect around AI that's impacting software in your view, meaning when you think about all these companies starting to gear up for this next platform shift.
CRM_2025Q1_4609.summary: The analyst is inquiring about the potential crowding effect around AI that may be influencing the software market as companies prepare for the next platform shift.

CRM_2025Q1_4612.speaker: Marc Benioff
CRM_2025Q1_4612.original_quote: As you know, we've integrated these products into a cohesive offering, which enhances our ability to leverage future artificial intelligence.
CRM_2025Q1_4612.summary: The company has integrated its products into a cohesive offering to enhance its ability to leverage future artificial intelligence.

CRM_2024Q4_4597.speaker: Marc Benioff
CRM_2024Q4_4597.original_quote: But this is especially crucial amid the transformative wave of artificial intelligence in our industry, which amplifies our need for this data.
CRM_2024Q4_4597.summary: The company emphasizes the importance of data in light of the transformative wave of artificial intelligence in their industry.

SLB_2023Q4_4622.speaker: Olivier Le Peuch
SLB_2023Q4_4622.original_quote: As a result, we achieved full year digital revenue of more than $2 billion with our new technology platforms comprised of cloud, edge, and AI, growing at a CAGR of 60% since 2021.
SLB_2023Q4_4622.summary: SLB achieved full year digital revenue exceeding $2 billion from their new technology platforms, which include cloud, edge, and AI, with a compound annual growth rate of 60% since 2021.

SBAC_2024Q3_4617.speaker: Brendan Cavanagh
SBAC_2024Q3_4617.original_quote: Other growth drivers, which we have discussed before, such as fixed wireless access, the incorporation of new generative AI capabilities into handsets, regulatory build-out commitments and remaining 5G coverage expansion will all contribute to a healthy network investment environment over the next s
SBAC_2024Q3_4617.summary: The company is incorporating new generative AI capabilities into handsets as part of its growth strategy.

SLB_2024Q2_4626.speaker: Olivier Le Peuch
SLB_2024Q2_4626.original_quote: Finally, underpinning nearly everything we do is the power of digital and AI.
SLB_2024Q2_4626.summary: SLB emphasizes that the power of digital and AI is fundamental to nearly all of their operations.

SLB_2023Q4_4623.speaker: Olivier Le Peuch
SLB_2023Q4_4623.original_quote: And I think this relates to the adoption of Delfi, indeed, adoption of a number of users, the use of cloud compute on our Delfi platform and the use of additional hedge or AI capability that we offer to customers.
SLB_2023Q4_4623.summary: SLB is adopting cloud compute on their Delfi platform and offering additional AI capabilities to customers.

SLB_2024Q3_4628.speaker: James West
SLB_2024Q3_4628.original_quote: But for next year, but digital uptake is accelerating and the quality of the digital uptake, not just going to the cloud, but also using all the AI tools is accelerating as well.
SLB_2024Q3_4628.summary: SLB is experiencing an acceleration in digital uptake, which includes the increased use of AI tools alongside transitioning to the cloud.

SLB_2024Q3_4630.speaker: Olivier Le Peuch
SLB_2024Q3_4630.original_quote: And finally, the third leg of growth in our digital portfolio is the emergence of new data and AI capability, as you have seen, the Lumi that we have put in place.
SLB_2024Q3_4630.summary: SLB is enhancing its digital portfolio by incorporating new data and AI capabilities, specifically mentioning the implementation of Lumi.

SLB_2024Q3_4631.speaker: Kurt Hallead
SLB_2024Q3_4631.original_quote: In the context of the follow-up meetings, what were one or two insights that emerged from those discussions with potential clients for your generative AI product?
SLB_2024Q3_4631.summary: The company is discussing insights gained from follow-up meetings with potential clients regarding their generative AI product.

SLB_2024Q3_4633.speaker: Olivier Le Peuch
SLB_2024Q3_4633.original_quote: Our ability to not only participate fully but also gain share in this market and unlock white space in this market, such as with Lumi data and AI, and offer edge autonomous operation, I think will create a long growth opportunity that will be largely uncorrelated.
SLB_2024Q3_4633.summary: SLB is participating in the market by utilizing Lumi data and AI to offer edge autonomous operations, which they believe will create long-term growth opportunities.

SLB_2024Q4_4635.speaker: Olivier Le Peuch
SLB_2024Q4_4635.original_quote: Our customers continue to embrace the power of cloud computing, AI, and digital operations to shorten cycle times and improve operating efficiencies.
SLB_2024Q4_4635.summary: SLB's customers are utilizing cloud computing, AI, and digital operations to reduce cycle times and enhance operational efficiencies.

SLB_2024Q1_4624.speaker: Olivier Le Peuch
SLB_2024Q1_4624.original_quote: In this context, there are certain priorities that are increasingly critical to our customers: project life-cycle reduction, particularly in exploration & appraisal to accelerate time to first gas or first oil; capital efficiency in the development phase to set new benchmarks in every basin; steps t
SLB_2024Q1_4624.summary: The company is focusing on project life-cycle reduction and capital efficiency to meet critical priorities for their customers, particularly in exploration and appraisal.

SLB_2024Q4_4636.speaker: Stephane Biguet
SLB_2024Q4_4636.original_quote: On a full year basis, Digital revenue of $2.44 billion grew 20% year-on-year, supported by close to 35% growth from Cloud, AI, and Edge technology.
SLB_2024Q4_4636.summary: SLB reported that their Digital revenue reached $2.44 billion, with a year-on-year growth of 20%, driven by nearly 35% growth from Cloud, AI, and Edge technology.

STX_2023Q3_4640.speaker: Dave Mosley
STX_2023Q3_4640.original_quote: We create more data continually through videos, communications, AI, and other mediums, all of which require storage.
STX_2023Q3_4640.summary: The company creates more data through AI among other mediums, which necessitates storage solutions.

SLB_2024Q4_4639.speaker: Olivier Le Peuch
SLB_2024Q4_4639.original_quote: Customers are keen to connect their datasets and unlock data insights using our AI platform.
SLB_2024Q4_4639.summary: SLB is providing an AI platform that enables customers to connect their datasets and unlock data insights.

STX_2023Q4_4641.speaker: Dave Mosley
STX_2023Q4_4641.original_quote: We also believe the timing for demand recovery could be affected by spending priorities focused on accelerating the build-out of compute-intensive AI infrastructure.
STX_2023Q4_4641.summary: The company believes that demand recovery may be influenced by spending priorities that are aimed at accelerating the development of compute-intensive AI infrastructure.

STX_2023Q4_4646.speaker: Dave Mosley
STX_2023Q4_4646.original_quote: And I think to the questions about generative AI and other feature sets, we’re not at peak cloud yet.
STX_2023Q4_4646.summary: The company acknowledges the relevance of generative AI and other features but indicates that they have not yet reached peak cloud capabilities.

SLB_2024Q3_4634.speaker: Olivier Le Peuch
SLB_2024Q3_4634.original_quote: Hence, the operation of Lumi as a platform to address customers that are more interested in unlocking data and directly accessing AI through a data platform as opposed to having to adopt the full suite.
SLB_2024Q3_4634.summary: SLB is operating Lumi as a platform that allows customers to unlock data and directly access AI through a data platform, rather than requiring them to adopt the full suite of services.

STX_2024Q1_4650.speaker: Dave Mosley
STX_2024Q1_4650.original_quote: And then you layer on top of all these new applications that will be really sped up with features like AI and generative AI on top of them, I think that there's big healthy demand growth coming.

STX_2023Q4_4645.speaker: Dave Mosley
STX_2023Q4_4645.original_quote: There are some generative AI discussions that are very transactional and probably don’t need a whole lot of HDD and then there are a lot that are very video-intensive and want data to be sequestered in a certain tank so that nothing else can touch it.

STX_2024Q2_4655.speaker: Dave Mosley
STX_2024Q2_4655.original_quote: The one point that you just raised was the whole AI TPC demand, which I think is still very early innings in this but we do see opportunity there, high-end workstations, if you will, that are running AI applications may actually be an interesting opportunity.
STX_2024Q2_4655.summary: The company sees potential opportunities in high-end workstations that run AI applications, indicating that AI TPC demand is still in its early stages.

STX_2024Q2_4657.speaker: Dave Mosley
STX_2024Q2_4657.original_quote: Again, I think in the AI applications that are really exploding right now, power is going to become one of the limiting factors.
STX_2024Q2_4657.summary: The company is acknowledging that power will be a limiting factor in the rapidly growing AI applications.

STX_2023Q4_4644.speaker: Kurt Swartz

STX_2024Q2_4659.speaker: Dave Mosley

STX_2024Q1_4648.speaker: Dave Mosley

TEL_2024Q2_4903.speaker: Terrence Curtin
TEL_2024Q2_4903.original_quote: When considering our share in AI applications, it mirrors the share we held in cloud applications.
TEL_2024Q2_4903.summary: TEL's share in AI applications is comparable to the share it previously held in cloud applications.

TEL_2025Q1_4934.speaker: Asiya Merchant
TEL_2025Q1_4934.original_quote: How do you guys think about this AI opportunity?
TEL_2025Q1_4934.summary: The analyst is inquiring about the company's perspective on the AI opportunity.

TEL_2024Q4_4928.speaker: Heath Mitts
TEL_2024Q4_4928.original_quote: As for AI orders, while they drive our growth projections, it's crucial to factor in broader aspects such as non-cloud AI and general enterprise needs when making your assumptions about our revenue guidance for next year.
TEL_2024Q4_4928.summary: TEL is experiencing growth projections driven by AI orders, but emphasizes the importance of considering broader factors like non-cloud AI and general enterprise needs in revenue guidance for the next year.

TEL_2025Q1_4936.speaker: Joe Spak
TEL_2025Q1_4936.original_quote: I'm curious if, as you continue to see strong growth in AI, we might experience some variability in margins from that growth based on the investment pace and the timing of when business comes online?
TEL_2025Q1_4936.summary: The analyst is inquiring about the potential impact of strong growth in AI on margins, specifically regarding the investment pace and the timing of business coming online.

TEL_2024Q4_4922.speaker: Heath Mitts
TEL_2024Q4_4922.original_quote: Overall, 30% remains a reasonable outlook, though it's not solely driven by AI; there are also cost actions being addressed across the broader segment.
TEL_2024Q4_4922.summary: The company indicates that while AI is a factor, it is not the sole driver of their outlook, which is projected at 30%. They also mention that cost actions are being taken across the broader segment.

TEL_2024Q4_4925.speaker: Terrence Curtin
TEL_2024Q4_4925.original_quote: We often highlight AI, but it’s critical to recognize that traditional cloud elements are also witnessing a return to growth.
TEL_2024Q4_4925.summary: The company highlights AI as an important aspect, but emphasizes that traditional cloud elements are also experiencing growth.

TEL_2025Q2_4938.speaker: Terrence Curtin
TEL_2025Q2_4938.original_quote: DDN, the AI ramps, you know, what we see, those ramps have accelerated.
TEL_2025Q2_4938.summary: TEL observes that the ramps for DDN, which relate to AI, have accelerated.

TER_2024Q2_4957.speaker: Greg Smith
TER_2024Q2_4957.original_quote: Cloud AI is driving strong demand across the SoC and memory test markets.
TER_2024Q2_4957.summary: The company is experiencing strong demand in the SoC and memory test markets due to Cloud AI.

TER_2024Q2_4960.speaker: Krish Sankar
TER_2024Q2_4960.original_quote: Do you think this networking test opportunity can manifest itself into some share gains on the GPU side or you think that AI opportunity is more to the VIPs, not to the Semi device makers?
TER_2024Q2_4960.summary: The analyst is inquiring whether the networking test opportunity could lead to market share gains in the GPU sector or if the AI opportunity is primarily beneficial for VIPs rather than semiconductor device manufacturers.

TEL_2025Q1_4935.speaker: Heath Mitts
TEL_2025Q1_4935.original_quote: And to Terrence's point, some of that's obviously driven by the AI activity within our DDN business, but it's also more broad-based across other areas like energy and aerospace and defense, and then modest recoveries in things like our ECL business, which is the old industrial equipment and applianc
TEL_2025Q1_4935.summary: TEL's DDN business is experiencing growth driven by AI activity, and this trend is also observed in other sectors such as energy and aerospace and defense.

TER_2024Q3_4966.speaker: Mehdi Hosseini
TER_2024Q3_4966.original_quote: And just as a follow-up, when I asked your customers, it seems like the overall test time for the next generation of AI Blackwell increases by more than 30% versus the prior generation.
TER_2024Q3_4966.summary: The quote indicates that the overall test time for the next generation of AI Blackwell has increased by more than 30% compared to the previous generation.

TEL_2025Q2_4944.speaker: William Stein
TEL_2025Q2_4944.original_quote: The question is about my AI data center business.
TEL_2025Q2_4944.summary: The company is inquiring about its AI data center business.

TER_2024Q3_4970.speaker: Greg Smith
TER_2024Q3_4970.original_quote: What excites me is the application of AI to enable cobots to manage the vast number of SKUs they deal with daily.
TER_2024Q3_4970.summary: The company is applying AI to enable cobots to manage a large number of SKUs daily.

TER_2024Q3_4971.speaker: Greg Smith
TER_2024Q3_4971.original_quote: To address your question about whether AI will be the sole growth driver next year, the key takeaway is that the rest of the market is likely to see incremental improvements alongside a robust AI market.
TER_2024Q3_4971.summary: The company indicates that while AI will be a significant growth driver next year, other market segments are expected to experience incremental improvements as well.

TER_2024Q3_4976.speaker: Gus Richard
TER_2024Q3_4976.original_quote: I just want to ask about your expectations for complexity growth and mobile processors in the next generation next year, including more AI capability, perhaps integration of modems.
TER_2024Q3_4976.summary: The quote inquires about expectations for complexity growth in mobile processors, specifically mentioning the integration of more AI capabilities in the next generation.

TER_2024Q1_4948.speaker: Sanjay Mehta
TER_2024Q1_4948.original_quote: In memory, our sales were strongest in DRAM as AI-driven demand remains strong.
TER_2024Q1_4948.summary: The company reports that sales in DRAM memory were strongest due to strong demand driven by AI.

TER_2024Q4_4981.speaker: Greg Smith
TER_2024Q4_4981.original_quote: Our R&D teams for UR and MiR are performing well, and the introduction of AI features into our products or enabling our partners to adopt AI-driven robotics is a key advantage.
TER_2024Q4_4981.summary: The company is introducing AI features into its products and enabling partners to adopt AI-driven robotics, which is seen as a key advantage.

TER_2024Q1_4956.speaker: Gregory Smith
TER_2024Q1_4956.original_quote: Well, one thing is that most of the advanced packaging capacity in the world has been consumed by the people who are doing cloud AI and high-performance computing.
TER_2024Q1_4956.summary: The company notes that the majority of advanced packaging capacity globally is being utilized by entities involved in cloud AI and high-performance computing.

TER_2024Q4_4982.speaker: Jacob Moore
TER_2024Q4_4982.original_quote: While AI and Compute are clearly strong drivers, the PC, notebook, and mobile segments still represent significant volume.
TER_2024Q4_4982.summary: The company acknowledges that AI and Compute are strong drivers of growth, but emphasizes that the PC, notebook, and mobile segments continue to represent significant volume.

TER_2024Q3_4974.speaker: Brian Chin
TER_2024Q3_4974.original_quote: Greg, can you help to quantify roughly what percentage of the mobile installed tester base has been reduced, rationalized, or repurposed for other chips and markets such as AI accelerator GPUs and ASICs?
TER_2024Q3_4974.summary: The analyst is asking for a quantification of the percentage of the mobile installed tester base that has been reduced or repurposed for AI accelerator GPUs and ASICs.

TER_2025Q1_4988.speaker: C.J. Muse
TER_2025Q1_4988.original_quote: So can you give us a little more color on what you're seeing with AI accelerators?
TER_2025Q1_4988.summary: The analyst is asking for more details about the company's observations regarding AI accelerators.

TER_2025Q1_4990.speaker: Greg Smith
TER_2025Q1_4990.original_quote: Also if the rise of AI-enabled smartphones requires a lot more local storage for model parameters, that would increase the amount of NAND per phone.
TER_2025Q1_4990.summary: The company notes that the rise of AI-enabled smartphones will necessitate increased local storage for model parameters, which in turn will boost the demand for NAND storage per phone.

TER_2025Q1_4991.speaker: Greg Smith
TER_2025Q1_4991.original_quote: However, the trend is clearly upward, and we have already seen an increase in system orders related to AI accelerators.
TER_2025Q1_4991.summary: The company has observed an increase in system orders specifically related to AI accelerators, indicating a positive trend in demand.

TER_2024Q4_4984.speaker: Toshiya Hari

TER_2024Q4_4984.summary: The quote inquires about anticipated growth in the VIP business and AI Compute sectors, specifically whether it will come from existing customers or through new products and attracting new customers in 2025 and 2026.

TSLA_2024Q4_5007.speaker: Elon Musk
TSLA_2024Q4_5007.original_quote: We've invested heavily in manufacturing AI and robotics this year, which will yield significant benefits in the future.

TER_2024Q4_4985.speaker: Sanjay Mehta

TER_2024Q4_4978.speaker: Greg Smith

TER_2024Q4_4980.speaker: Greg Smith

TTD_2023Q3_5035.speaker: Jeff Green

TTD_2023Q4_5039.speaker: Jeff Green

TTD_2024Q3_5046.summary: The Trade Desk is incorporating AI and data science into its latest product release, Kokai, which is encouraging CMOs and CFOs to rely on the company for measurable growth.

TTD_2024Q1_5042.summary: The company notes a broad industry frenzy around AI in advertising and marketing, indicating a heightened interest and activity related to AI in their sector.

TSCO_2024Q1_5053.summary: The company is leveraging AI in their stores and Garden Centers through Tractor Vision, which uses cameras and computer vision technology to provide data and deploy alerts to assist team members.

TTD_2024Q2_5044.speaker: Laura Schenkein

TT_2024Q2_5063.speaker: David Regnery

TRMB_2025Q4_5089.speaker: Robert Painter

TRMB_2025Q4_5089.summary: The company is rolling out agentic AI capabilities, which they believe will strategically correlate with customer adoption in 2026.

TRMB_2025Q4_5091.speaker: Robert Painter

TRMB_2025Q4_5085.summary: TRMB has introduced new AI agents in SketchUp and has begun implementing a credit system for their use.

TYL_2025Q2_5112.speaker: H. Lynn Moore

TYL_2024Q4_5105.speaker: Alexei Gogolev

TYL_2025Q1_5111.speaker: Lynn Moore

TYL_2025Q1_5111.summary: The company is prioritizing innovation and making meaningful progress with its AI initiatives, specifically to empower the public sector.

TYL_2025Q3_5115.speaker: Lynn Moore
TYL_2025Q3_5115.original_quote: Building on this foundation, our purpose-built AI innovation is amplifying the power of the cloud, creating more seamless connected client experiences, deepening relationships, and expanding cross-sell and upsell opportunities across our portfolio.
TYL_2025Q3_5115.summary: The company is building purpose-built AI innovations that enhance cloud capabilities, improve client experiences, and create opportunities for cross-selling and upselling within their portfolio.

TYL_2025Q2_5114.speaker: H. Lynn Moore

TYL_2025Q3_5126.speaker: Brian Miller

UBER_2025Q1_5139.original_quote: There are also emerging players focusing on next-generation, end-to-end models, like Wayves and Waabi in trucking, as well as Momenta, showcasing a pure AI approach that promises rapid development and wide software applicability across driving scenarios and hardware.

UBER_2025Q1_5141.speaker: Dara Khosrowshahi
UBER_2025Q1_5141.original_quote: Yes, I think on delivery and large language models, we’re very, very early in terms of the development of the models and their application to consumer experiences or enterprise technology.
UBER_2025Q1_5141.summary: Uber acknowledges that they are in the early stages of developing large language models and applying them to consumer experiences and enterprise technology.

UBER_2025Q3_5145.speaker: Dara Khosrowshahi

TYL_2025Q3_5122.speaker: Lynn Moore

TYL_2025Q3_5122.summary: The company is incorporating AI features and functionalities into its offerings.

TYL_2025Q3_5123.summary: The quote mentions frustration in the software ecosystem regarding the slow realization of productivity gains from AI in knowledge workers and at the application layer.

UDR_2025Q4_5157.speaker: Mike Lacey
UDR_2025Q4_5157.original_quote: How I think about it going forward, scalable ways AI can help us service our residents better, reduce friction, and improve decision-making.
UDR_2025Q4_5157.summary: UDR is exploring scalable ways AI can enhance resident services, minimize friction, and improve decision-making processes.

UBER_2025Q3_5146.summary: Uber is focused on empowering various types of work through its AI solutions.

UPS_2023Q2_5161.speaker: Carol Tomé

UPS_2023Q2_5161.summary: UPS is using AI and machine learning through NPT technologies to leverage their data for rapid adjustments in planning, scheduling, and volume flows across their network.

UPS_2025Q3_5163.speaker: Carol Tomé

UPS_2025Q3_5163.summary: UPS is using AI to enhance its next-generation brokerage capabilities, processing over 90% of cross-border transactions with improved speed and accuracy.

UNH_2025Q4_5180.speaker: Stephen Hemsley

UNH_2025Q4_5183.speaker: Wayne DeVeydt

UNH_2025Q4_5183.summary: The company is experiencing early benefits from its investments in artificial intelligence, which are part of its ongoing productivity initiatives and disciplined cost management.
